357/**
358 * Counts or destroys and drops the bash items of all furniture that matches @ref f in the map tile
359 * @param comp NPC companion
360 * @param omt_tgt the targeted OM tile
361 * @param f furniture you are looking for
362 * @param chance chance of destruction, 0 to 100
363 * @param estimate if true, non-destructive count of the furniture
364 * @param bring_back force the destruction of the furniture and bring back the drop items
365 */

477static bool update_time_left( std::string &entry, const comp_list &npc_list )
478{
479 bool avail = false;
480 for( auto &comp : npc_list ) {
481 if( comp->companion_mission_time_ret < calendar:: turn ) {
482 entry = entry + _( " [DONE]\n" );
483 avail = true;
484 } else {
485 entry = entry + " [" +
486 to_string( comp->companion_mission_time_ret - calendar::turn ) +
487 _( " left]\n" );
488 avail = g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
489 }
490 }
491 entry = entry + _( "\n\nDo you wish to bring your allies back into your party?" );
492 return avail;
493}
494
495static bool update_time_fixed( std::string &entry, const comp_list &npc_list,
496 const time_duration &duration )
497{
498 bool avail = false;
499 for( auto &comp : npc_list ) {
500 time_duration elapsed = calendar::turn - comp->companion_mission_time;
501 entry = entry + " " + comp->name + " [" + to_string( elapsed ) + "/" +
502 to_string( duration ) + "]\n";
503 avail |= elapsed >= duration;
504 }
505 entry = entry + _( "\n\nDo you wish to bring your allies back into your party?" );
506 return avail;
507}
508
509static cata::optional<basecamp *> get_basecamp( npc &p, const std::string &camp_type = "default" )
510{
511
512 tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
513 cata::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
514 if( bcp ) {
515 return bcp;
516 }
517 get_map().add_camp( omt_pos, "faction_camp" );
518 bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
519 if( !bcp ) {
520 return cata::nullopt;
521 }
522 basecamp *temp_camp = *bcp;
523 temp_camp->define_camp( omt_pos, camp_type );
524 return temp_camp;
525}
526
527recipe_id base_camps::select_camp_option( const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &pos_options,
528 const std::string &option )
529{
530 std::vector<recipe_id> pos_name_ids;
531 std::vector<std::string> pos_names;
532 for( const auto &it : pos_options ) {
533 pos_names.push_back( it.second.translated() );
534 pos_name_ids.push_back( it.first );
535 }
536
537 if( pos_name_ids.size() == 1 ) {
538 return pos_name_ids.front();
539 }
540
541 const int choice = uilist( _( option ), pos_names );
542 if( choice < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( choice ) >= pos_name_ids.size() ) {
543 popup( _( "You choose to wait" ) );
544 return recipe_id::NULL_ID();
545 }
546 return pos_name_ids[choice];
547}
548
549void talk_function::start_camp( npc &p )
550{
551 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
552 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_pos );
553
554 const auto &pos_camps = recipe_group::get_recipes_by_id( "all_faction_base_types",
555 omt_ref.id().c_str() );
556 if( pos_camps.empty() ) {
557 popup( _( "You cannot build a camp here." ) );
558 return;
559 }
560 const recipe_id camp_type = base_camps::select_camp_option( pos_camps,
561 _( "Select a camp type:" ) );
562 if( !camp_type ) {
563 return;
564 }
565
566 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> om_region =
567 om_building_region( omt_pos, 1 );
568 int near_fields = 0;
569 for( const auto &om_near : om_region ) {
570 const oter_id &om_type = oter_id( om_near.first );
571 if( is_ot_match( "field", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
572 near_fields += 1;
573 }
574 }
575 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> om_region_ext =
576 om_building_region( omt_pos, 3 );
577 int forests = 0;
578 int waters = 0;
579 for( const auto &om_near : om_region_ext ) {
580 const oter_id &om_type = oter_id( om_near.first );
581 if( is_ot_match( "faction_base", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
582 popup( _( "You are too close to another camp!" ) );
583 return;
584 } else if( is_ot_match( "forest", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
585 forests++;
586 } else if( is_ot_match( "river", om_type, ot_match_type::contains ) ) {
587 waters++;
588 }
589 }
590 bool display = false;
591 std::string buffer = _( "Warning, you have selected a region with the following issues:\n\n" );
592 if( forests < 3 ) {
593 display = true;
594 buffer += _( "There are few forests. Wood is your primary construction material.\n" );
595 }
596 if( waters == 0 ) {
597 display = true;
598 buffer += _( "There are few large clean-ish water sources.\n" );
599 }
600 if( near_fields < 4 ) {
601 display = true;
602 buffer += _( "There are few fields. Farming may be difficult.\n" );
603 }
604 if( display && !query_yn( _( "%s\nAre you sure you wish to continue?" ), buffer ) ) {
605 return;
606 }
607 const recipe &making = camp_type.obj();
608 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( making.get_blueprint(), omt_pos ) ) {
609 popup( _( "%s failed to start the %s basecamp, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
610 p.disp_name(), making.get_blueprint() );
611 return;
612 }
613 get_basecamp( p, camp_type.str() );
614}
615
616void talk_function::recover_camp( npc &p )
617{
618 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
619 const std::string &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_pos ).id().c_str();
620 if( omt_ref.find( "faction_base_camp" ) == std::string::npos ) {
621 popup( _( "There is no faction camp here to recover!" ) );
622 return;
623 }
624 get_basecamp( p );
625}
626
627void talk_function::remove_overseer( npc &p )
628{
629 size_t suffix = p.name.find( _( ", Camp Manager" ) );
630 if( suffix != std::string::npos ) {
631 p.name = p.name.substr( 0, suffix );
632 }
633
634 add_msg( _( "%s has abandoned the camp." ), p.name );
635 p.companion_mission_role_id.clear();
636 stop_guard( p );
637}
638
639void talk_function::basecamp_mission( npc &p )
640{
641 const std::string title = _( "Base Missions" );
642 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = p.global_omt_location();
643 mission_data mission_key;
644
645 cata::optional<basecamp *> temp_camp = get_basecamp( p );
646 if( !temp_camp ) {
647 return;
648 }
649 basecamp *bcp = *temp_camp;
650 bcp->set_by_radio( g->u.dialogue_by_radio );
651 if( bcp->get_dumping_spot() == tripoint_zero ) {
652 map &here = get_map();
653 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
654 if( here.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
655 mgr.cache_vzones();
656 }
657 tripoint src_loc;
658 const auto abspos = p.global_square_location();
659 if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos, 60 ) ) {
660 const auto &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
661 const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
662 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
663 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
664 src_loc = here.getlocal( src );
665 break;
666 }
667 }
668 bcp->set_dumping_spot( here.getabs( src_loc ) );
669 }
670 bcp->get_available_missions( mission_key );
671 if( display_and_choose_opts( mission_key, omt_pos, base_camps::id, title ) ) {
672 bcp->handle_mission( mission_key.cur_key.id, mission_key.cur_key.dir );
673 }
674}
675
676void basecamp::add_available_recipes( mission_data &mission_key, const point &dir,
677 const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &craft_recipes )
678{
679 const std::string dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
680 const std::string dir_abbr = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).bracket_abbr.translated();
681 for( const auto &recipe_data : craft_recipes ) {
682 const std::string id = dir_id + recipe_data.first.str();
683 const std::string &title_e = dir_abbr + recipe_data.second;
684 const std::string &entry = craft_description( recipe_data.first );
685 const recipe &recp = recipe_data.first.obj();
686 bool craftable = recp.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
687 _inv, recp.get_component_filter() );
688 mission_key.add_start( id, title_e, dir, entry, craftable );
689 }
690}

1092 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1093 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1094 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1095 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1096 }
1097 }
1098
1099 if( has_provides( "blacksmith", dir ) ) {
1100 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" + dir_id );
1101 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info =
1102 base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" ];
1103 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1104 add_available_recipes( mission_key, dir, craft_recipes );
1105 } else {
1106 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1107 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1108 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1109 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1110 }
1111 }
1112
1113 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1114 size_t plots = 0;
1115 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_plow_" + dir_id );
1116 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_plow_" ];
1117 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1118 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1119 "Plow any spaces that have reverted to dirt or grass.\n\n" ) +
1120 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plow ) +
1121 _( "\n\n"
1122 "Skill used: fabrication\n"
1123 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1124 "Effects:\n"
1125 "> Restores only the plots created in the last expansion upgrade.\n"
1126 "> Does not damage existing crops.\n\n"
1127 "Risk: None\n"
1128 "Time: 5 Min / Plot\n"
1129 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1130 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id, dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir,
1131 entry, plots > 0 );
1132 } else {
1133 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1134 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1135 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1136 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1137 }
1138 }
1139 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1140 size_t plots = 0;
1141 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_plant_" + dir_id );
1142 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_plant_" ];
1143 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1144 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1145 "Plant designated seeds in the spaces that have already been "
1146 "tilled.\n\n" ) +
1147 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::plant ) +
1148 _( "\n\n"
1149 "Skill used: survival\n"
1150 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1151 "Effects:\n"
1152 "> Choose which seed type or all of your seeds.\n"
1153 "> Stops when out of seeds or planting locations.\n"
1154 "> Will plant in ALL dirt mounds in the expansion.\n\n"
1155 "Risk: None\n"
1156 "Time: 1 Min / Plot\n"
1157 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1158 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id,
1159 dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir, entry,
1160 plots > 0 && warm_enough_to_plant( omt_trg ) );
1161 } else {
1162 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1163 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1164 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1165 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1166 }
1167 }
1168 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
1169 size_t plots = 0;
1170 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + dir_id );
1171 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_harvest_" ];
1172 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1173 entry = _( "Notes:\n"
1174 "Harvest any plants that are ripe and bring the produce back.\n\n" ) +
1175 farm_description( omt_trg, plots, farm_ops::harvest ) +
1176 _( "\n\n"
1177 "Skill used: survival\n"
1178 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1179 "Effects:\n"
1180 "> Will dump all harvesting products onto your location.\n\n"
1181 "Risk: None\n"
1182 "Time: 3 Min / Plot\n"
1183 "Positions: 0/1\n" );
1184 mission_key.add_start( dir_id + miss_info.miss_id,
1185 dir_abbr + miss_info.desc, dir, entry,
1186 plots > 0 );
1187 } else {
1188 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1189 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1190 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1191 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1192 }
1193 }
1194
1195 if( has_provides( "reseeding", dir ) ) {
1196 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" + dir_id );
1197 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info =
1198 base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" ];
1199 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1200 add_available_recipes( mission_key, dir, craft_recipes );
1201 } else {
1202 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1203 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1204 mission_key.add_return( dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1205 dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, dir, entry, avail );
1206 }
1207 }
1208}
1209
1210void basecamp::get_available_missions( mission_data &mission_key )
1211{
1212 std::string entry;
1213
1214 const point &base_dir = base_camps::base_dir;
1215 const base_camps::direction_data &base_data = base_camps::all_directions.at( base_dir );
1216 const std::string base_dir_id = base_data.id;
1217 const std::string base_dir_abbr = base_data.bracket_abbr.translated();
1218 reset_camp_resources();
1219 std::string gather_bldg = "null";
1220
1221 // Handling for the central tile
1222 // return legacy workers
1223 comp_list legacy_npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1224 if( !legacy_npc_list.empty() ) {
1225 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_upgrade_camp" ];
1226 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1227 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, legacy_npc_list );
1228 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1229 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1230 }
1231 for( const basecamp_upgrade &upgrade : available_upgrades( base_camps::base_dir ) ) {
1232 gather_bldg = upgrade.bldg;
1233 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_upgrade_camp" ];
1234 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( upgrade.bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1235 if( npc_list.empty() && !upgrade.in_progress ) {
1236 entry = om_upgrade_description( upgrade.bldg );
1237 mission_key.add_start( miss_info.miss_id + upgrade.bldg,
1238 miss_info.desc + " " + upgrade.name, base_camps::base_dir,
1239 entry, upgrade.avail );
1240 } else if( !npc_list.empty() && upgrade.in_progress ) {
1241 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1242 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1243 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id + upgrade.bldg,
1244 miss_info.ret_desc + " " + upgrade.name, base_camps::base_dir,
1245 entry, avail );
1246 }
1247 }
1248
1249 // Missions that belong exclusively to the central tile
1250 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_camp_crafting_" + base_dir_id );
1251 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_crafting_" ];
1252 //This handles all crafting by the base, regardless of level
1253 if( npc_list.empty() ) {
1254 std::map<recipe_id, translation> craft_recipes = recipe_deck( base_camps::base_dir );
1255 add_available_recipes( mission_key, base_camps::base_dir, craft_recipes );
1256 } else {
1257 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1258 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1259 mission_key.add_return( base_dir_id + miss_info.ret_miss_id,
1260 base_dir_abbr + miss_info.ret_desc, base_camps::base_dir, entry,
1261 avail );
1262 }
1263 if( can_expand() ) {
1264 comp_list npc_list = get_mission_workers( "_faction_camp_expansion" );
1265 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_expansion" ];
1266 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1267 "Your base has become large enough to support an expansion. "
1268 "Expansions open up new opportunities but can be expensive and "
1269 "time consuming. Pick them carefully, only 8 can be built at "
1270 "each camp.\n\n"
1271 "Skill used: N/A\n"
1272 "Effects:\n"
1273 "> Choose any one of the available expansions. Starting with "
1274 "a farm is always a solid choice since food is used to support "
1275 "companion missions and little is needed to get it going. "
1276 "With minimal investment, a mechanic can be useful as a "
1277 "chop-shop to rapidly dismantle large vehicles, and a forge "
1278 "provides the resources to make charcoal.\n\n"
1279 "NOTE: Actions available through expansions are located in "
1280 "separate tabs of the Camp Manager window.\n\n"
1281 "Risk: None\n"
1282 "Time: 3 Hours\n"
1283 "Positions: %d/1\n" ), npc_list.size() );
1284 mission_key.add_start( miss_info.miss_id, miss_info.desc.translated(),
1285 base_camps::base_dir, entry, npc_list.empty() );
1286 if( !npc_list.empty() ) {
1287 entry = miss_info.action.translated();
1288 bool avail = update_time_left( entry, npc_list );
1289 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1290 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1291 }
1292 }
1293
1294 if( !by_radio ) {
1295 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1296 "Distribute food to your follower and fill you larders. "
1297 "Place the food you wish to distribute in the camp food zone. "
1298 "You must have a camp food zone, and a camp storage zone, "
1299 "or you will be prompted to create them using the zone manager.\n"
1300 "Effects:\n"
1301 "> Increases your faction's food supply value which in "
1302 "turn is used to pay laborers for their time\n\n"
1303 "Must have enjoyability >= -6\n"
1304 "Perishable food liquidated at penalty depending on "
1305 "upgrades and rot time:\n"
1306 "> Rotten: 0%%\n"
1307 "> Rots in < 2 days: 60%%\n"
1308 "> Rots in < 5 days: 80%%\n\n"
1309 "Total faction food stock: %d kcal\nor %d day's rations" ),
1310 camp_food_supply(), camp_food_supply( 0, true ) );
1311 mission_key.add( "Distribute Food", _( "Distribute Food" ), entry );
1312 validate_assignees();
1313 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1314 "Assign repeating job duties to NPCs stationed here.\n"
1315 "Difficulty: N/A\n"
1316 "Effects:\n"
1317 "\n\nRisk: None\n"
1318 "Time: Ongoing" ) );
1319 mission_key.add( "Assign Jobs", _( "Assign Jobs" ), entry );
1320 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1321 "Assign followers to work at this camp." ) );
1322 mission_key.add( "Assign Workers", _( "Assign Workers" ), entry );
1323 entry = _( "Notes:\nAbandon this camp" );
1324 mission_key.add( "Abandon Camp", _( "Abandon Camp" ), entry );
1325 }
1326 // Missions assigned to the central tile that could be done by an expansion
1327 get_available_missions_by_dir( mission_key, base_camps::base_dir );
1328
1329 // Loop over expansions
1330 for( const point &dir : directions ) {
1331 get_available_missions_by_dir( mission_key, dir );
1332 }
1333
1334 if( !camp_workers.empty() ) {
1335 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ "_faction_camp_recall" ];
1336 entry = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
1337 "Cancel a current mission and force the immediate return of a "
1338 "companion. No work will be done on the mission and all "
1339 "resources used on the mission will be lost.\n\n"
1340 "WARNING: All resources used on the mission will be lost and "
1341 "no work will be done. Only use this mission to recover a "
1342 "companion who cannot otherwise be recovered.\n\n"
1343 "Companions must be on missions for at least 24 hours before "
1344 "emergency recall becomes available." ) );
1345 bool avail = update_time_fixed( entry, camp_workers, 24_hours );
1346 mission_key.add_return( miss_info.ret_miss_id, miss_info.ret_desc.translated(),
1347 base_camps::base_dir, entry, avail );
1348 }
1349}
1350
1351bool basecamp::handle_mission( const std::string &miss_id,
1352 const cata::optional<point> &opt_miss_dir )
1353{
1354 const point &miss_dir = opt_miss_dir ? *opt_miss_dir : base_camps::base_dir;
1355
1356 if( miss_id == "Distribute Food" ) {
1357 distribute_food();
1358 }
1359
1360 if( miss_id.size() > 12 && miss_id.substr( 0, 12 ) == "Upgrade Camp" ) {
1361 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 12 );
1362 start_upgrade( bldg, base_camps::base_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1363 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally from Upgrading" ) {
1364 upgrade_return( base_camps::base_dir, "_faction_upgrade_camp" );
1365 } else if( miss_id.size() > 27 && miss_id.substr( 0, 27 ) == "Recover Ally from Upgrading" ) {
1366 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 27 );
1367 upgrade_return( base_camps::base_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_camp", bldg );
1368 }
1369
1370 if( miss_id == "Menial Labor" ) {
1371 start_menial_labor();
1372 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Menial Laborer" ) {
1373 menial_return();
1374 }
1375
1376 if( miss_id == "Assign Jobs" ) {
1377 job_assignment_ui();
1378 }
1379 if( miss_id == "Assign Workers" ) {
1380 worker_assignment_ui();
1381 }
1382 if( miss_id == "Abandon Camp" ) {
1383 abandon_camp();
1384 }
1385
1386 if( miss_id == "Expand Base" ) {
1387 start_mission( "_faction_camp_expansion", 3_hours, true,
1388 _( "departs to survey land" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1389 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Surveyor" ) {
1390 survey_return();
1391 }
1392
1393 if( miss_id == "Gather Materials" ) {
1394 start_mission( "_faction_camp_gathering", 3_hours, true,
1395 _( "departs to search for materials" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1396 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally from Gathering" ) {
1397 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_gathering", 3_hours );
1398 }
1399
1400 if( miss_id == "Collect Firewood" ) {
1401 start_mission( "_faction_camp_firewood", 3_hours, true,
1402 _( "departs to search for firewood" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1403 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Firewood Gatherers" ) {
1404 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_firewood", 3_hours );
1405 }
1406
1407 if( miss_id == "Cut Logs" ) {
1408 start_cut_logs();
1409 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Log Cutter" ) {
1410 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working in the woods" );
1411 mission_return( "_faction_camp_cut_log", 6_hours, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
1412 }
1413
1414 if( miss_id == "Clearcut" ) {
1415 start_clearcut();
1416 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Clearcutter" ) {
1417 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working in the woods" );
1418 mission_return( "_faction_camp_clearcut", 6_hours, true, msg, "construction", 1 );
1419 }
1420
1421 if( miss_id == "Setup Hide Site" ) {
1422 start_setup_hide_site();
1423 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hide Setup" ) {
1424 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working on the hide site" );
1425 mission_return( "_faction_camp_hide_site", 3_hours, true, msg, "survival", 3 );
1426 }
1427
1428 if( miss_id == "Relay Hide Site" ) {
1429 start_relay_hide_site();
1430 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hide Transport" ) {
1431 const std::string msg = _( "returns from shuttling gear between the hide site" );
1432 mission_return( "_faction_camp_hide_trans", 3_hours, true, msg, "survival", 3 );
1433 }
1434
1435 if( miss_id == "Camp Forage" ) {
1436 start_mission( "_faction_camp_foraging", 4_hours, true,
1437 _( "departs to search for edible plants" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 0 );
1438 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Foragers" ) {
1439 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_foraging", 4_hours );
1440 }
1441 if( miss_id == "Trap Small Game" ) {
1442 start_mission( "_faction_camp_trapping", 6_hours, true,
1443 _( "departs to set traps for small animals" ), false, {}, skill_traps, 0 );
1444 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Trappers" ) {
1445 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_trapping", 6_hours );
1446 }
1447
1448 if( miss_id == "Hunt Large Animals" ) {
1449 start_mission( "_faction_camp_hunting", 6_hours, true,
1450 _( "departs to hunt for meat" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1451 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Hunter" ) {
1452 gathering_return( "_faction_camp_hunting", 6_hours );
1453 }
1454
1455 if( miss_id == "Construct Map Fort" || miss_id == "Construct Trench" ) {
1456 std::string bldg_exp = "faction_wall_level_N_0";
1457 if( miss_id == "Construct Trench" ) {
1458 bldg_exp = "faction_wall_level_N_1";
1459 }
1460 start_fortifications( bldg_exp );
1461 } else if( miss_id == "Finish Map Fort" ) {
1462 fortifications_return();
1463 }
1464
1465 if( miss_id == "Recruit Companions" ) {
1466 start_mission( "_faction_camp_recruit_0", 4_days, true,
1467 _( "departs to search for recruits" ), false, {}, skill_gun, 0 );
1468 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Recruiter" ) {
1469 recruit_return( "_faction_camp_recruit_0", recruit_evaluation() );
1470 }
1471
1472 if( miss_id == "Scout Mission" ) {
1473 start_combat_mission( "_faction_camp_scout_0" );
1474 } else if( miss_id == "Combat Patrol" ) {
1475 start_combat_mission( "_faction_camp_combat_0" );
1476 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Scout" ) {
1477 combat_mission_return( "_faction_camp_scout_0" );
1478 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Combat Patrol" ) {
1479 combat_mission_return( "_faction_camp_combat_0" );
1480 }
1481
1482 const std::string base_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( base_camps::base_dir ).id;
1483 const std::string miss_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( miss_dir ).id;
1484 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_trg = omt_pos + miss_dir;
1485
1486 if( miss_id.substr( 0, 18 + miss_dir_id.size() ) == miss_dir_id + " Expansion Upgrade" ) {
1487 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( 18 + miss_dir_id.size() );
1488 start_upgrade( bldg, miss_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id );
1489 } else if( miss_id == "Recover Ally, " + miss_dir_id + " Expansion" ) {
1490 upgrade_return( miss_dir, "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id );
1491 } else {
1492 const std::string search_str = "Recover Ally, " + miss_dir_id + " Expansion";
1493 size_t search_len = search_str.size();
1494 if( miss_id.size() > search_len && miss_id.substr( 0, search_len ) == search_str ) {
1495 const std::string bldg = miss_id.substr( search_len );
1496 upgrade_return( miss_dir, bldg + "_faction_upgrade_exp_" + miss_dir_id, bldg );
1497 }
1498 }
1499
1500 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "BASE", "_faction_camp_crafting_" );
1501 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "FARM", "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" );
1502 if( miss_id == base_dir_id + " (Finish) Crafting" ) {
1503 const std::string msg = _( "returns to you with something" );
1504 mission_return( "_faction_camp_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes, true, msg,
1505 "construction", 2 );
1506 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Crafting" ) {
1507 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your farm with something" );
1508 mission_return( "_faction_exp_farm_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes, true, msg,
1509 "construction", 2 );
1510 }
1511
1512 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "COOK", "_faction_exp_kitchen_cooking_" );
1513 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Cooking" ) {
1514 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your kitchen with something" );
1515 mission_return( "_faction_exp_kitchen_cooking_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes,
1516 true, msg, "cooking", 2 );
1517 }
1518
1519 start_crafting( miss_id, miss_dir, "SMITH", "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" );
1520 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Smithing" ) {
1521 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your blacksmith shop with something" );
1522 mission_return( "_faction_exp_blacksmith_crafting_" + miss_dir_id, 1_minutes,
1523 true, msg, "fabrication", 2 );
1524 }
1525 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Plow Fields" ) {
1526 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::plow );
1527 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Plow Fields" ) {
1528 farm_return( "_faction_exp_plow_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::plow );
1529 }
1530
1531 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Plant Fields" ) {
1532 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::plant );
1533 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Plant Fields" ) {
1534 farm_return( "_faction_exp_plant_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::plant );
1535 }
1536
1537 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Harvest Fields" ) {
1538 start_farm_op( miss_dir, omt_trg, farm_ops::harvest );
1539 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Harvest Fields" ) {
1540 farm_return( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + miss_dir_id, omt_trg, farm_ops::harvest );
1541 }
1542
1543 if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " Chop Shop" ) {
1544 start_garage_chop( miss_dir, omt_trg );
1545 } else if( miss_id == miss_dir_id + " (Finish) Chop Shop" ) {
1546 const std::string msg = _( "returns from your garage" );
1547 mission_return( "_faction_exp_chop_shop_" + miss_dir_id, 5_days, true, msg,
1548 "mechanics", 2 );
1549 }
1550
1551 if( miss_id == "Emergency Recall" ) {
1552 emergency_recall();
1553 }
1554
1555 return true;
1556
1557}
1558
1559// camp faction companion mission start functions
1560npc_ptr basecamp::start_mission( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration duration,
1561 bool must_feed, const std::string &desc, bool /*group*/,
1562 const std::vector<item *> &equipment,
1563 const skill_id &skill_tested, int skill_level )
1564{
1565 std::map<skill_id, int> required_skills;
1566 required_skills[ skill_tested ] = skill_level;
1567 return start_mission( miss_id, duration, must_feed, desc, false, equipment, required_skills );
1568}
1569
1570npc_ptr basecamp::start_mission( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration duration,
1571 bool must_feed, const std::string &desc, bool /*group*/,
1572 const std::vector<item *> &equipment,
1573 const std::map<skill_id, int> &required_skills )
1574{
1575 if( must_feed && camp_food_supply() < time_to_food( duration ) ) {
1576 popup( _( "You don't have enough food stored to feed your companion." ) );
1577 return nullptr;
1578 }
1579 npc_ptr comp = talk_function::individual_mission( omt_pos, base_camps::id, desc, miss_id,
1580 false, equipment, required_skills );
1581 if( comp != nullptr ) {
1582 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + duration;
1583 if( must_feed ) {
1584 camp_food_supply( duration );
1585 }
1586 }
1587 return comp;
1588}
1589
1590void basecamp::start_upgrade( const std::string &bldg, const point &dir,
1591 const std::string &key )
1592{
1593 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg ).obj();
1594 //Stop upgrade if you don't have materials
1595 if( making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
1596 _inv, making.get_component_filter() ) ) {
1597 bool must_feed = bldg != "faction_base_camp_1";
1598
1599 basecamp_action_components components( making, 1, *this );
1600 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
1601 return;
1602 }
1603
1604 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() );
1605 npc_ptr comp = nullptr;
1606 if( making.required_skills.empty() ) {
1607 if( making.skill_used.is_valid() ) {
1608 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed,
1609 _( "begins to upgrade the camp" ), false, {},
1610 making.skill_used, making.difficulty );
1611 } else {
1612 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed,
1613 _( "begins to upgrade the camp" ), false, {} );
1614 }
1615 } else {
1616 comp = start_mission( key, work_days, must_feed, _( "begins to upgrade the camp" ),
1617 false, {}, making.required_skills );
1618 }
1619 if( comp == nullptr ) {
1620 return;
1621 }
1622 components.consume_components();
1623 update_in_progress( bldg, dir );
1624 } else {
1625 popup( _( "You don't have the materials for the upgrade." ) );
1626 }
1627}
1628
1629void basecamp::abandon_camp()
1630{
1631 validate_assignees();
1632 for( npc_ptr &guy : overmap_buffer.get_companion_mission_npcs( 10 ) ) {
1633 npc_companion_mission c_mission = guy->get_companion_mission();
1634 if( c_mission.role_id != base_camps::id ) {
1635 continue;
1636 }
1637 const std::string return_msg = _( "responds to the emergency recall" );
1638 finish_return( *guy, false, return_msg, "menial", 0, true );
1639 }
1640 for( npc_ptr &guy : get_npcs_assigned() ) {
1641 talk_function::stop_guard( *guy );
1642 }
1643 overmap_buffer.remove_camp( *this );
1644 map &here = get_map();
1645 here.remove_submap_camp( here.getlocal( bb_pos ) );
1646 add_msg( m_info, _( "You abandon %s." ), name );
1647}
1648
1649void basecamp::worker_assignment_ui()
1650{
1651 int entries_per_page = 0;
1652 catacurses::window w_followers;
1653
1654 ui_adaptor ui;
1655 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1656 const point term( TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0,
1657 TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0 );
1658
1659 w_followers = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
1660 point( term.y, term.x ) );
1661 entries_per_page = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 4;
1662
1663 ui.position_from_window( w_followers );
1664 } );
1665 ui.mark_resize();
1666
1667 size_t selection = 0;
1668 input_context ctxt( "FACTION MANAGER" );
1669 ctxt.register_updown();
1670 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1671 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1672 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1673 validate_assignees();
1674 g->validate_npc_followers();
1675
1676 std::vector<npc *> followers;
1677 npc *cur_npc = nullptr;
1678
1679 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1680 werase( w_followers );
1681
1682 // entries_per_page * page number
1683 const size_t top_of_page = entries_per_page * ( selection / entries_per_page );
1684
1685 for( int i = 0; i < FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1; i++ ) {
1686 mvwputch( w_followers, point( 45, i ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
1687 }
1688 draw_border( w_followers );
1689 const nc_color col = c_white;
1690 const std::string no_npcs = _( "You have no companions following you." );
1691 if( !followers.empty() ) {
1692 draw_scrollbar( w_followers, selection, entries_per_page, followers.size(),
1693 point( 0, 3 ) );
1694 for( size_t i = top_of_page; i < followers.size(); i++ ) {
1695 const int y = i - top_of_page + 3;
1696 trim_and_print( w_followers, point( 1, y ), 43, selection == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
1697 followers[i]->disp_name() );
1698 }
1699 } else {
1700 mvwprintz( w_followers, point( 1, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1701 }
1702 mvwprintz( w_followers, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 ), c_light_gray,
1703 _( "Press %s to assign this follower to this camp." ), ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) );
1704 wnoutrefresh( w_followers );
1705 } );
1706
1707 while( true ) {
1708 // create a list of npcs stationed at this camp
1709 followers.clear();
1710 for( const character_id &elem : g->get_follower_list() ) {
1711 shared_ptr_fast<npc> npc_to_get = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
1712 if( !npc_to_get || !npc_to_get->is_following() ) {
1713 continue;
1714 }
1715 npc *npc_to_add = npc_to_get.get();
1716 followers.push_back( npc_to_add );
1717 }
1718 cur_npc = nullptr;
1719 if( !followers.empty() ) {
1720 cur_npc = followers[selection];
1721 }
1722
1723 ui_manager::redraw();
1724 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1725 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1726 selection++;
1727 if( selection >= followers.size() ) {
1728 selection = 0;
1729 }
1730 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1731 if( selection == 0 ) {
1732 selection = followers.empty() ? 0 : followers.size() - 1;
1733 } else {
1734 selection--;
1735 }
1736 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1737 if( !followers.empty() && cur_npc ) {
1738 talk_function::assign_camp( *cur_npc );
1739 }
1740 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1741 break;
1742 }
1743 }
1744}

1746void basecamp::job_assignment_ui()
1747{
1748 int entries_per_page = 0;
1749 catacurses::window w_jobs;
1750
1751 ui_adaptor ui;
1752 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1753 const point term( TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0,
1754 TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0 );
1755
1756 w_jobs = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
1757 point( term.y, term.x ) );
1758
1759 entries_per_page = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 4;
1760
1761 ui.position_from_window( w_jobs );
1762 } );
1763 ui.mark_resize();
1764
1765 size_t selection = 0;
1766 input_context ctxt( "FACTION MANAGER" );
1767 ctxt.register_updown();
1768 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1769 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1770 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1771 validate_assignees();
1772
1773 std::vector<npc *> stationed_npcs;
1774 npc *cur_npc = nullptr;
1775
1776 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1777 werase( w_jobs );
1778 const size_t top_of_page = entries_per_page * ( selection / entries_per_page );
1779 for( int i = 0; i < FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1; i++ ) {
1780 mvwputch( w_jobs, point( 45, i ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
1781 }
1782 draw_border( w_jobs );
1783 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 1 ), c_white, _( "Job/Priority" ) );
1784 const nc_color col = c_white;
1785 const std::string no_npcs = _( "There are no npcs stationed here" );
1786 if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
1787 draw_scrollbar( w_jobs, selection, entries_per_page, stationed_npcs.size(),
1788 point( 0, 3 ) );
1789 for( size_t i = top_of_page; i < stationed_npcs.size(); i++ ) {
1790 const int y = i - top_of_page + 3;
1791 trim_and_print( w_jobs, point( 1, y ), 43, selection == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
1792 stationed_npcs[i]->disp_name() );
1793 }
1794 if( selection < stationed_npcs.size() ) {
1795 int start_y = 3;
1796 if( cur_npc ) {
1797 if( cur_npc->has_job() ) {
1798 for( activity_id &elem : cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector() ) {
1799 const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
1800 player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
1801 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_gray, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ),
1802 test_act.get_verb(), std::to_string( priority ) ) );
1803 start_y++;
1804 }
1805 } else {
1806 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, start_y ), c_light_red, _( "No current job." ) );
1807 }
1808 }
1809 } else {
1810 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1811 }
1812 } else {
1813 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 46, 4 ), c_light_red, no_npcs );
1814 }
1815 mvwprintz( w_jobs, point( 1, FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT - 1 ), c_light_gray,
1816 _( "Press %s to change this workers job priorities." ), ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ) );
1817 wnoutrefresh( w_jobs );
1818 } );
1819
1820 while( true ) {
1821 // create a list of npcs stationed at this camp
1822 stationed_npcs.clear();
1823 for( const auto &elem : get_npcs_assigned() ) {
1824 if( elem ) {
1825 stationed_npcs.push_back( elem.get() );
1826 }
1827 }
1828 cur_npc = nullptr;
1829 // entries_per_page * page number
1830 if( !stationed_npcs.empty() ) {
1831 cur_npc = stationed_npcs[selection];
1832 }
1833
1834 ui_manager::redraw();
1835
1836 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1837 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1838 selection++;
1839 if( selection >= stationed_npcs.size() ) {
1840 selection = 0;
1841 }
1842 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1843 if( selection == 0 ) {
1844 selection = stationed_npcs.empty() ? 0 : stationed_npcs.size() - 1;
1845 } else {
1846 selection--;
1847 }
1848 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1849 if( cur_npc ) {
1850 while( true ) {
1851 uilist smenu;
1852 smenu.text = _( "Assign job priority ( 0 to disable )" );
1853 int count = 0;
1854 std::vector<activity_id> job_vec = cur_npc->job.get_prioritised_vector();
1855 smenu.addentry( count, true, 'C', _( "Clear all priorities" ) );
1856 count++;
1857 for( const activity_id &elem : job_vec ) {
1858 player_activity test_act = player_activity( elem );
1859 const int priority = cur_npc->job.get_priority_of_job( elem );
1860 smenu.addentry( count, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, string_format( _( "%s : %s" ), test_act.get_verb(),
1861 std::to_string( priority ) ) );
1862 count++;
1863 }
1864 smenu.query();
1865 if( smenu.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
1866 break;
1867 } else if( smenu.ret == 0 ) {
1868 cur_npc->job.clear_all_priorities();
1869 } else if( smenu.ret > 0 && smenu.ret <= static_cast<int>( job_vec.size() ) ) {
1870 activity_id sel_job = job_vec[smenu.ret - 1];
1871 player_activity test_act = player_activity( sel_job );
1872 const std::string formatted = string_format( _( "Priority for %s " ), test_act.get_verb() );
1873 const int amount = string_input_popup()
1874 .title( formatted )
1875 .width( 20 )
1876 .only_digits( true )
1877 .query_int();
1878 cur_npc->job.set_task_priority( sel_job, amount );
1879 } else {
1880 break;
1881 }
1882 }
1883 }
1884 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1885 break;
1886 }
1887 }
1888}

1890void basecamp::start_menial_labor()
1891{
1892 if( camp_food_supply() < time_to_food( 3_hours ) ) {
1893 popup( _( "You don't have enough food stored to feed your companion." ) );
1894 return;
1895 }
1896 shared_ptr_fast<npc> comp = talk_function::companion_choose();
1897 if( comp == nullptr ) {
1898 return;
1899 }
1900 validate_sort_points();
1901
1902 comp->assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );
1903 popup( _( "%s goes off to clean toilets and sort loot." ), comp->disp_name() );
1904}

1906void basecamp::start_cut_logs()
1907{
1908 std::vector<std::string> log_sources = { "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water" };
1909 popup( _( "Forests and swamps are the only valid cutting locations." ) );
1910 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 1, 50, log_sources );
1911 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
1912 standard_npc sample_npc( "Temp" );
1913 sample_npc.set_fake( true );
1914 int tree_est = om_cutdown_trees_est( forest, 50 );
1915 int tree_young_est = om_harvest_ter_est( sample_npc, forest,
1916 ter_id( "t_tree_young" ), 50 );
1917 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
1918 //Very roughly what the player does + 6 hours for prep, clean up, breaks
1919 time_duration chop_time = 6_hours + 1_hours * tree_est + 7_minutes * tree_young_est;
1920 int haul_items = 2 * tree_est + 3 * tree_young_est;
1921 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
1922 2, haul_items );
1923 time_duration work_time = travel_time + chop_time;
1924 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time,
1925 chop_time, travel_time, dist, 2, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
1926 return;
1927 }
1928
1929 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_cut_log", work_time, true,
1930 _( "departs to cut logs" ), false, {},
1931 skill_fabrication, 2 );
1932 if( comp != nullptr ) {
1933 om_cutdown_trees_logs( forest, 50 );
1934 om_harvest_ter( *comp, forest, ter_id( "t_tree_young" ), 50 );
1935 mass_volume harvest = om_harvest_itm( comp, forest, 95 );
1936 // recalculate trips based on actual load and capacity
1937 travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2,
1938 harvest.count );
1939 work_time = travel_time + chop_time;
1940 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
1941 //If we cleared a forest...
1942 if( om_cutdown_trees_est( forest ) < 5 ) {
1943 const oter_id &omt_trees = overmap_buffer.ter( forest );
1944 //Do this for swamps "forest_wet" if we have a swamp without trees...
1945 if( omt_trees.id() == "forest" || omt_trees.id() == "forest_thick" ) {
1946 overmap_buffer.ter_set( forest, oter_id( "field" ) );
1947 }
1948 }
1949 }
1950 }
1951}

1956 popup( _( "Forests are the only valid cutting locations." ) );

1988void basecamp::start_setup_hide_site()
1989{
1990 std::vector<std::string> hide_locations = { "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water",
1991 "field"
1992 };
1993 popup( _( "Forests, swamps, and fields are valid hide site locations." ) );
1994 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 10, 90, hide_locations, true, true,
1995 omt_pos, true );
1996 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
1997 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
1998 inventory tgt_inv = g->u.inv;
1999 std::vector<item *> pos_inv = tgt_inv.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
2000 return !itm.can_revive();
2001 } );
2002 if( !pos_inv.empty() ) {
2003 std::vector<item *> losing_equipment = give_equipment( pos_inv,
2004 _( "Do you wish to give your companion "
2005 "additional items?" ) );
2006 int trips = om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment );
2007 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : losing_equipment.size();
2008 time_duration build_time = 6_hours;
2009 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
2010 2, haulage );
2011 time_duration work_time = travel_time + build_time;
2012 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time,
2013 build_time, travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
2014 return;
2015 }
2016 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_hide_site", work_time, true,
2017 _( "departs to build a hide site" ), false, {},
2018 skill_survival, 3 );
2019 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2020 trips = om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment, comp );
2021 haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : losing_equipment.size();
2022 work_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2, haulage ) +
2023 build_time;
2024 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
2025 om_set_hide_site( *comp, forest, losing_equipment );
2026 }
2027 } else {
2028 popup( _( "You need equipment to setup a hide site" ) );
2029 }
2030 }
2031}
2032
2033void basecamp::start_relay_hide_site()
2034{
2035 std::vector<std::string> hide_locations = { "faction_hide_site_0" };
2036 popup( _( "You must select an existing hide site." ) );
2037 tripoint_abs_omt forest = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 10, 90, hide_locations, true, true,
2038 omt_pos, true );
2039 if( forest != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
2040 int dist = rl_dist( forest.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2041 inventory tgt_inv = g->u.inv;
2042 std::vector<item *> pos_inv = tgt_inv.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
2043 return !itm.can_revive();
2044 } );
2045 std::vector<item *> losing_equipment;
2046 if( !pos_inv.empty() ) {
2047 losing_equipment = give_equipment( pos_inv,
2048 _( "Do you wish to give your companion "
2049 "additional items?" ) );
2050 }
2051 //Check items in improvised shelters at hide site
2052 tinymap target_bay;
2053 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( forest ), false );
2054 std::vector<item *> hide_inv;
2055 for( item &i : target_bay.i_at( point( 11, 10 ) ) ) {
2056 hide_inv.push_back( &i );
2057 }
2058 std::vector<item *> gaining_equipment;
2059 if( !hide_inv.empty() ) {
2060 gaining_equipment = give_equipment( hide_inv, _( "Bring gear back?" ) );
2061 }
2062 if( !losing_equipment.empty() || !gaining_equipment.empty() ) {
2063 //Only get charged the greater trips since return is free for both
2064 int trips = std::max( om_carry_weight_to_trips( gaining_equipment ),
2065 om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment ) );
2066 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : std::max( gaining_equipment.size(),
2067 losing_equipment.size() );
2068 time_duration build_time = 6_hours;
2069 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes,
2070 trips, haulage );
2071 time_duration work_time = travel_time + build_time;
2072 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( work_time, build_time,
2073 travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( work_time ) ) ) ) {
2074 return;
2075 }
2076
2077 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_hide_trans", work_time, true,
2078 _( "departs for the hide site" ), false, {},
2079 skill_survival, 3 );
2080 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2081 // recalculate trips based on actual load
2082 trips = std::max( om_carry_weight_to_trips( gaining_equipment, comp ),
2083 om_carry_weight_to_trips( losing_equipment, comp ) );
2084 int haulage = trips <= 2 ? 0 : std::max( gaining_equipment.size(),
2085 losing_equipment.size() );
2086 work_time = companion_travel_time_calc( forest, omt_pos, 0_minutes, trips,
2087 haulage ) + build_time;
2088 comp->companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::turn + work_time;
2089 om_set_hide_site( *comp, forest, losing_equipment, gaining_equipment );
2090 }
2091 } else {
2092 popup( _( "You need equipment to transport between the hide site" ) );
2093 }
2094 }
2095}

2097void basecamp::start_fortifications( std::string &bldg_exp )
2098{
2099 std::vector<std::string> allowed_locations = {
2100 "forest", "forest_thick", "forest_water", "field"
2101 };
2102 popup( _( "Select a start and end point. Line must be straight. Fields, forests, and "
2103 "swamps are valid fortification locations. In addition to existing fortification "
2104 "constructions." ) );
2105 tripoint_abs_omt start = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations );
2106 popup( _( "Select an end point." ) );
2107 tripoint_abs_omt stop = om_target_tile( omt_pos, 2, 90, allowed_locations, true, false, start );
2108 if( start != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) &&
2109 stop != tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
2110 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg_exp ).obj();
2111 bool change_x = ( start.x() != stop.x() );
2112 bool change_y = ( start.y() != stop.y() );
2113 if( change_x && change_y ) {
2114 popup( "Construction line must be straight!" );
2115 return;
2116 }
2117 if( bldg_exp == "faction_wall_level_N_1" ) {
2118 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2119 int line_count = tmp_line.size();
2120 int yes_count = 0;
2121 for( auto elem : tmp_line ) {
2122 if( std::find( fortifications.begin(), fortifications.end(), elem ) != fortifications.end() ) {
2123 yes_count += 1;
2124 }
2125 }
2126 if( yes_count < line_count ) {
2127 popup( _( "Spiked pits must be built over existing trenches!" ) );
2128 return;
2129 }
2130 }
2131 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> fortify_om;
2132 if( ( change_x && stop.x() < start.x() ) || ( change_y && stop.y() < start.y() ) ) {
2133 //line_to doesn't include the origin point
2134 fortify_om.push_back( stop );
2135 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( stop, start );
2136 fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2137 } else {
2138 fortify_om.push_back( start );
2139 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> tmp_line = line_to( start, stop );
2140 fortify_om.insert( fortify_om.end(), tmp_line.begin(), tmp_line.end() );
2141 }
2142 int trips = 0;
2143 time_duration build_time = 0_hours;
2144 time_duration travel_time = 0_hours;
2145 int dist = 0;
2146 for( auto fort_om : fortify_om ) {
2147 bool valid = false;
2148 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( fort_om );
2149 for( const std::string &pos_om : allowed_locations ) {
2150 if( omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om ) {
2151 valid = true;
2152 break;
2153 }
2154 }
2155
2156 if( !valid ) {
2157 popup( _( "Invalid terrain in construction path." ) );
2158 return;
2159 }
2160 trips += 2;
2161 build_time += making.batch_duration();
2162 dist += rl_dist( fort_om.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2163 travel_time += companion_travel_time_calc( fort_om, omt_pos, 0_minutes, 2 );
2164 }
2165 time_duration total_time = base_camps::to_workdays( travel_time + build_time );
2166 int need_food = time_to_food( total_time );
2167 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( total_time, build_time,
2168 travel_time, dist, trips, need_food ) ) ) {
2169 return;
2170 } else if( !making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( _inv,
2171 making.get_component_filter(), ( fortify_om.size() * 2 ) - 2 ) ) {
2172 popup( _( "You don't have the material to build the fortification." ) );
2173 return;
2174 }
2175
2176 const int batch_size = fortify_om.size() * 2 - 2;
2177 basecamp_action_components components( making, batch_size, *this );
2178 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
2179 return;
2180 }
2181
2182 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_camp_om_fortifications", total_time, true,
2183 _( "begins constructing fortifications" ), false, {},
2184 making.required_skills );
2185 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2186 components.consume_components();
2187 comp->companion_mission_role_id = bldg_exp;
2188 for( auto pt : fortify_om ) {
2189 comp->companion_mission_points.push_back( pt );
2190 }
2191 }
2192 }
2193}

2195void basecamp::start_combat_mission( const std::string &miss )
2196{
2197 popup( _( "Select checkpoints until you reach maximum range or select the last point again "
2198 "to end." ) );
2199 tripoint_abs_omt start = omt_pos;
2200 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> scout_points = om_companion_path( start, 90, true );
2201 if( scout_points.empty() ) {
2202 return;
2203 }
2204 int dist = scout_points.size();
2205 int trips = 2;
2206 time_duration travel_time = companion_travel_time_calc( scout_points, 0_minutes, trips );
2207 if( !query_yn( _( "Trip Estimate:\n%s" ), camp_trip_description( 0_hours, 0_hours,
2208 travel_time, dist, trips, time_to_food( travel_time ) ) ) ) {
2209 return;
2210 }
2211 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( miss, travel_time, true, _( "departs on patrol" ),
2212 false, {}, skill_survival, 3 );
2213 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2214 comp->companion_mission_points = scout_points;
2215 }
2216}
2217
2218// the structure of this function has driven (at least) two devs insane
2219// recipe_deck returns a map of recipe ids to descriptions
2220// it first checks whether the mission id starts with the correct direction prefix,
2221// and then search for the mission id without direction prefix in the recipes
2222// if there's a match, the player has selected a crafting mission
2223void basecamp::start_crafting( const std::string &cur_id, const point &cur_dir,
2224 const std::string &type, const std::string &miss_id )
2225{
2226 const std::string cur_dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( cur_dir ).id;
2227 const std::map<recipe_id, translation> &recipes = recipe_deck( type );
2228 if( cur_id.substr( 0, cur_dir_id.size() ) != cur_dir_id ) {
2229 // not a crafting mission or has the wrong direction
2230 return;
2231 }
2232 const auto it = recipes.find( recipe_id( cur_id.substr( cur_dir_id.size() ) ) );
2233 if( it != recipes.end() ) {
2234 const recipe &making = it->first.obj();
2235
2236 if( !making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
2237 _inv, making.get_component_filter() ) ) {
2238 popup( _( "You don't have the materials to craft that" ) );
2239 return;
2240 }
2241
2242 int batch_size = 1;
2243 string_input_popup popup_input;
2244 int batch_max = recipe_batch_max( making );
2245 const std::string title = string_format( _( "Batch crafting %s [MAX: %d]: " ),
2246 making.result_name(), batch_max );
2247 popup_input.title( title ).edit( batch_size );
2248
2249 if( popup_input.canceled() || batch_size <= 0 ) {
2250 return;
2251 }
2252 if( batch_size > recipe_batch_max( making ) ) {
2253 popup( _( "Your batch is too large!" ) );
2254 return;
2255 }
2256
2257 basecamp_action_components components( making, batch_size, *this );
2258 if( !components.choose_components() ) {
2259 return;
2260 }
2261
2262 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration( batch_size ) );
2263 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( miss_id + cur_dir_id, work_days, true,
2264 _( "begins to work" ), false, {},
2265 making.required_skills );
2266 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2267 components.consume_components();
2268 for( const item &results : making.create_results( batch_size ) ) {
2269 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( results );
2270 }
2271 }
2272 return;
2273 }
2274}
2275
2276static bool farm_valid_seed( const item &itm )
2277{
2278 return itm.is_seed() && itm.typeId() != itype_marloss_seed && itm.typeId() != itype_fungal_seeds;
2279}
2280
2281static std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_action( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op,
2282 npc_ptr comp = nullptr )
2283{
2284 size_t plots_cnt = 0;
2285 std::string crops;
2286
2287 const auto is_dirtmound = []( const tripoint & pos, tinymap & bay1, tinymap & bay2 ) {
2288 return ( bay1.ter( pos ) == t_dirtmound ) && ( !bay2.has_furn( pos ) );
2289 };
2290 const auto is_unplowed = []( const tripoint & pos, tinymap & farm_map ) {
2291 const ter_id &farm_ter = farm_map.ter( pos );
2292 return farm_ter->has_flag( flag_PLOWABLE );
2293 };
2294
2295 std::set<std::string> plant_names;
2296 std::vector<item *> seed_inv;
2297 if( comp ) {
2298 seed_inv = comp->companion_mission_inv.items_with( farm_valid_seed );
2299 }
2300
2301 //farm_json is what the area should look like according to jsons
2302 tinymap farm_json;
2303 // TODO: fix point types
2304 farm_json.generate( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ).raw(), calendar::turn );
2305 //farm_map is what the area actually looks like
2306 tinymap farm_map;
2307 farm_map.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
2308 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
2309 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
2310 bool done_planting = false;
2311 map &here = get_map();
2312 for( const tripoint &pos : farm_map.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
2313 if( done_planting ) {
2314 break;
2315 }
2316 switch( op ) {
2317 case farm_ops::plow:
2318 //Needs to be plowed to match json
2319 if( is_dirtmound( pos, farm_json, farm_map ) && is_unplowed( pos, farm_map ) ) {
2320 plots_cnt += 1;
2321 if( comp ) {
2322 farm_map.ter_set( pos, t_dirtmound );
2323 }
2324 }
2325 break;
2326 case farm_ops::plant:
2327 if( is_dirtmound( pos, farm_map, farm_map ) ) {
2328 plots_cnt += 1;
2329 if( comp ) {
2330 if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2331 done_planting = true;
2332 break;
2333 }
2334 item *tmp_seed = seed_inv.back();
2335 seed_inv.pop_back();
2336 std::list<item> used_seed;
2337 if( tmp_seed->count_by_charges() ) {
2338 used_seed.push_back( *tmp_seed );
2339 tmp_seed->charges -= 1;
2340 if( tmp_seed->charges > 0 ) {
2341 seed_inv.push_back( tmp_seed );
2342 }
2343 }
2344 used_seed.front().set_age( 0_turns );
2345 farm_map.add_item_or_charges( pos, used_seed.front() );
2346 farm_map.set( pos, t_dirt, f_plant_seed );
2347 }
2348 }
2349 break;
2350 case farm_ops::harvest:
2351 if( farm_map.furn( pos ) == f_plant_harvest ) {
2352 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2353 map_stack items = farm_map.i_at( pos );
2354 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2355 return it.is_seed();
2356 } );
2357 if( seed != items.end() && farm_valid_seed( *seed ) ) {
2358 plots_cnt += 1;
2359 if( comp ) {
2360 int skillLevel = comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2361 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested from a seed
2362 int plant_cnt = rng( skillLevel / 2, skillLevel );
2363 plant_cnt = std::min( std::max( plant_cnt, 1 ), 9 );
2364 int seed_cnt = std::max( 1, rng( plant_cnt / 4, plant_cnt / 2 ) );
2365 for( auto &i : iexamine::get_harvest_items( *seed->type, plant_cnt,
2366 seed_cnt, true ) ) {
2367 here.add_item_or_charges( g->u.pos(), i );
2368 }
2369 farm_map.i_clear( pos );
2370 farm_map.furn_set( pos, f_null );
2371 farm_map.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2372 } else {
2373 plant_names.insert( item::nname( itype_id( seed->type->seed->fruit_id ) ) );
2374 }
2375 }
2376 }
2377 break;
2378 default:
2379 // let the callers handle no op argument
2380 break;
2381 }
2382 }
2383 if( comp ) {
2384 farm_map.save();
2385 }
2386
2387 int total_c = 0;
2388 for( const std::string &i : plant_names ) {
2389 if( total_c < 5 ) {
2390 crops += " " + i + "\n";
2391 total_c++;
2392 } else if( total_c == 5 ) {
2393 crops += _( "+ more\n" );
2394 break;
2395 }
2396 }
2397
2398 return std::make_pair( plots_cnt, crops );
2399}
2400
2401void basecamp::start_farm_op( const point &dir, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op )
2402{
2403 const std::string &dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
2404 std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_data = farm_action( omt_tgt, op );
2405 size_t plots_cnt = farm_data.first;
2406 if( !plots_cnt ) {
2407 return;
2408 }
2409
2410 time_duration work = 0_minutes;
2411 switch( op ) {
2412 case farm_ops::harvest:
2413 work += 3_minutes * plots_cnt;
2414 start_mission( "_faction_exp_harvest_" + dir_id, work, true,
2415 _( "begins to harvest the field" ), false, {}, skill_survival, 1 );
2416 break;
2417 case farm_ops::plant: {
2418 std::vector<item *> seed_inv = _inv.items_with( farm_valid_seed );
2419 if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2420 popup( _( "You have no additional seeds to give your companions" ) );
2421 return;
2422 }
2423 std::vector<item *> plant_these = give_equipment( seed_inv,
2424 _( "Which seeds do you wish to have planted?" ) );
2425 size_t seed_cnt = 0;
2426 for( item *seeds : plant_these ) {
2427 seed_cnt += seeds->count();
2428 }
2429 size_t plots_seeded = std::min( seed_cnt, plots_cnt );
2430 if( !seed_cnt ) {
2431 return;
2432 }
2433 work += 1_minutes * plots_seeded;
2434 start_mission( "_faction_exp_plant_" + dir_id, work, true,
2435 _( "begins planting the field" ), false, plant_these,
2436 skill_survival, 1 );
2437 break;
2438 }
2439 case farm_ops::plow:
2440 work += 5_minutes * plots_cnt;
2441 start_mission( "_faction_exp_plow_" + dir_id, work, true,
2442 _( "begins plowing the field" ), false, {} );
2443 break;
2444 default:
2445 debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no operation" );
2446 }
2447}
2448
2449bool basecamp::start_garage_chop( const point &dir, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt )
2450{
2451 editmap edit;
2452 vehicle *car = edit.mapgen_veh_query( omt_tgt );
2453 if( car == nullptr ) {
2454 return false;
2455 }
2456
2457 if( !query_yn( _( " Chopping this vehicle:\n%s" ), camp_car_description( car ) ) ) {
2458 return false;
2459 }
2460
2461 const std::string dir_id = base_camps::all_directions.at( dir ).id;
2462 npc_ptr comp = start_mission( "_faction_exp_chop_shop_" + dir_id, 5_days, true,
2463 _( "begins working in the garage" ), false, {},
2464 skill_mechanics, 2 );
2465 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2466 return false;
2467 }
2468 // FIXME: use ranges, do this sensibly
2469 //Chopping up the car!
2470 int skillLevel = comp->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics );
2471 for( int prt = 0; prt < car->part_count(); prt++ ) {
2472 vehicle_stack contents = car->get_items( prt );
2473 for( auto iter = contents.begin(); iter != contents.end(); ) {
2474 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( *iter );
2475 iter = contents.erase( iter );
2476 }
2477 bool broken = car->part( prt ).is_broken();
2478 bool skill_break = false;
2479 bool skill_destroy = false;
2480
2481 int dice = rng( 1, 20 );
2482 dice += skillLevel - car->part( prt ).info().difficulty;
2483
2484 if( dice >= 20 ) {
2485 skill_break = false;
2486 skill_destroy = false;
2487 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( *comp, skill_mechanics, 1_hours,
2488 car->part( prt ).info().difficulty );
2489 } else if( dice > 15 ) {
2490 skill_break = false;
2491 } else if( dice > 9 ) {
2492 skill_break = true;
2493 skill_destroy = false;
2494 } else {
2495 skill_break = true;
2496 skill_destroy = true;
2497 }
2498
2499 if( !broken && !skill_break ) {
2500 //Higher level garages will salvage liquids from tanks
2501 if( !car->part( prt ).is_battery() ) {
2502 car->part( prt ).ammo_consume( car->part( prt ).ammo_capacity(),
2503 car->global_part_pos3( car->part( prt ) ) );
2504 }
2505 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( car->part( prt ).properties_to_item() );
2506 } else if( !skill_destroy ) {
2507 for( const item &itm : car->part( prt ).pieces_for_broken_part() ) {
2508 comp->companion_mission_inv.add_item( itm );
2509 }
2510 }
2511 }
2512 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( *comp, skill_mechanics, 5_days, 2 );
2513 edit.mapgen_veh_destroy( omt_tgt, car );
2514 return true;
2515}

2517// camp faction companion mission recovery functions
2518npc_ptr basecamp::companion_choose_return( const std::string &miss_id,
2519 time_duration min_duration )
2520{
2521 return talk_function::companion_choose_return( omt_pos, base_camps::id, miss_id,
2522 calendar::turn - min_duration );
2523}
2524void basecamp::finish_return( npc &comp, const bool fixed_time, const std::string &return_msg,
2525 const std::string &skill, int difficulty, const bool cancel )
2526{
2527 popup( "%s %s", comp.name, return_msg );
2528 // this is the time the mission was expected to take, or did take for fixed time missions
2529 time_duration reserve_time = comp.companion_mission_time_ret - comp.companion_mission_time;
2530 time_duration mission_time = reserve_time;
2531 if( !fixed_time ) {
2532 mission_time = calendar::turn - comp.companion_mission_time;
2533 }
2534 if( !cancel ) {
2535 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, skill, mission_time, difficulty );
2536 }
2537
2538 // companions subtracted food when they started the mission, but didn't mod their hunger for
2539 // that food. so add it back in.
2540 int need_food = time_to_food( mission_time - reserve_time );
2541 if( camp_food_supply() < need_food ) {
2542 popup( _( "Your companion seems disappointed that your pantry is empty" ) );
2543 }
2544 int avail_food = std::min( need_food, camp_food_supply() ) + time_to_food( reserve_time );
2545 // movng all the logic from talk_function::companion return here instead of polluting
2546 // mission_companion
2547 comp.reset_companion_mission();
2548 comp.companion_mission_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
2549 comp.companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::before_time_starts;
2550 if( !cancel ) {
2551 for( size_t i = 0; i < comp.companion_mission_inv.size(); i++ ) {
2552 for( const auto &it : comp.companion_mission_inv.const_stack( i ) ) {
2553 if( !it.count_by_charges() || it.charges > 0 ) {
2554 place_results( it );
2555 }
2556 }
2557 }
2558 }
2559 comp.companion_mission_inv.clear();
2560 comp.companion_mission_points.clear();
2561 // npc *may* be active, or not if outside the reality bubble
2562 g->reload_npcs();
2563 validate_assignees();
2564
2565 camp_food_supply( -need_food );
2566 comp.mod_stored_kcal( avail_food );
2567 if( has_water() ) {
2568 comp.set_thirst( 0 );
2569 }
2570 comp.set_fatigue( 0 );
2571 comp.set_sleep_deprivation( 0 );
2572}
2573
2574npc_ptr basecamp::mission_return( const std::string &miss_id, time_duration min_duration,
2575 bool fixed_time, const std::string &return_msg,
2576 const std::string &skill, int difficulty )
2577{
2578 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss_id, min_duration );
2579 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2580 finish_return( *comp, fixed_time, return_msg, skill, difficulty );
2581 }
2582 return comp;
2583}

2605
2606bool basecamp::upgrade_return( const point &dir, const std::string &miss,
2607 const std::string &bldg )
2608{
2609 auto e = expansions.find( dir );
2610 if( e == expansions.end() ) {
2611 return false;
2612 }
2613 const tripoint_abs_omt upos = e->second.pos;
2614 const recipe &making = recipe_id( bldg ).obj();
2615
2616 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() );
2617 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss, work_days );
2618
2619 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2620 return false;
2621 }
2622 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( making.get_blueprint(), upos ) ) {
2623 popup( _( "%s failed to build the %s upgrade, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
2624 comp->disp_name(),
2625 making.get_blueprint() );
2626 return false;
2627 }
2628 update_provides( bldg, e->second );
2629 update_resources( bldg );
2630
2631 const std::string msg = _( "returns from upgrading the camp having earned a bit of "
2632 "experience" );
2633 finish_return( *comp, false, msg, "construction", making.difficulty );
2634
2635 return true;
2636}
