2648
2649bool basecamp::gathering_return( const std::string &task, time_duration min_time )
2650{
2651 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( task, min_time );
2652 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2653 return false;
2654 }
2655
2656 std::string task_description = _( "gathering materials" );
2657 int danger = 20;
2658 int favor = 2;
2659 int threat = 10;
2660 std::string skill_group = "gathering";
2661 int skill = 2 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + comp->per_cur;
2662 int checks_per_cycle = 6;
2663 if( task == "_faction_camp_foraging" ) {
2664 task_description = _( "foraging for edible plants" );
2665 danger = 15;
2666 checks_per_cycle = 12;
2667 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_trapping" ) {
2668 task_description = _( "trapping small animals" );
2669 favor = 1;
2670 danger = 15;
2671 skill_group = "trapping";
2672 skill = 2 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + comp->per_cur;
2673 checks_per_cycle = 4;
2674 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_hunting" ) {
2675 task_description = _( "hunting for meat" );
2676 danger = 10;
2677 favor = 0;
2678 skill_group = "hunting";
2679 skill = 1.5 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_gun ) + comp->per_cur / 2.0;
2680 threat = 12;
2681 checks_per_cycle = 2;
2682 }
2683
2684 time_duration mission_time = calendar::turn - comp->companion_mission_time;
2685 if( one_in( danger ) && !survive_random_encounter( *comp, task_description, favor, threat ) ) {
2686 return false;
2687 }
2688 const std::string msg = string_format( _( "returns from %s carrying supplies and has a bit "
2689 "more experience" ), task_description );
2690 finish_return( *comp, false, msg, skill_group, 1 );
2691
2692 item_group_id itemlist = item_group_id( "forest" );
2693 if( task == "_faction_camp_firewood" ) {
2694 itemlist = item_group_id( "gathering_faction_base_camp_firewood" );
2695 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_gathering" ) {
2696 itemlist = get_gatherlist();
2697 } else if( task == "_faction_camp_foraging" ) {
2698 switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
2699 case SPRING:
2700 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_spring" );
2701 break;
2702 case SUMMER:
2703 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_summer" );
2704 break;
2705 case AUTUMN:
2706 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_autumn" );
2707 break;
2708 case WINTER:
2709 itemlist = item_group_id( "foraging_faction_camp_winter" );
2710 break;
2711 default:
2712 debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
2713 }
2714 }
2715 if( task == "_faction_camp_trapping" || task == "_faction_camp_hunting" ) {
2716 hunting_results( skill, task, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 30 );
2717 } else {
2718 search_results( skill, itemlist, checks_per_cycle * mission_time / min_time, 15 );
2719 }
2720
2721 return true;
2722}
2723
2724void basecamp::fortifications_return()
2725{
2726 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( "_faction_camp_om_fortifications", 3_hours );
2727 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2728 std::string build_n = "faction_wall_level_N_0";
2729 std::string build_e = "faction_wall_level_E_0";
2730 std::string build_s = "faction_wall_level_S_0";
2731 std::string build_w = "faction_wall_level_W_0";
2732 if( comp->companion_mission_role_id == "faction_wall_level_N_1" ) {
2733 build_n = "faction_wall_level_N_1";
2734 build_e = "faction_wall_level_E_1";
2735 build_s = "faction_wall_level_S_1";
2736 build_w = "faction_wall_level_W_1";
2737 }
2738 std::string build_first = build_e;
2739 std::string build_second = build_w;
2740 bool build_dir_NS = comp->companion_mission_points[0].y() !=
2741 comp->companion_mission_points[1].y();
2742 if( build_dir_NS ) {
2743 build_first = build_s;
2744 build_second = build_n;
2745 }
2746 //Add fences
2747 auto build_point = comp->companion_mission_points;
2748 for( size_t pt = 0; pt < build_point.size(); pt++ ) {
2749 //First point is always at top or west since they are built in a line and sorted
2750 if( pt == 0 ) {
2751 run_mapgen_update_func( build_first, build_point[pt] );
2752 } else if( pt == build_point.size() - 1 ) {
2753 run_mapgen_update_func( build_second, build_point[pt] );
2754 } else {
2755 run_mapgen_update_func( build_first, build_point[pt] );
2756 run_mapgen_update_func( build_second, build_point[pt] );
2757 }
2758 if( comp->companion_mission_role_id == "faction_wall_level_N_0" ) {
2759 tripoint_abs_omt fort_point = build_point[pt];
2760 fortifications.push_back( fort_point );
2761 }
2762 }
2763 const std::string msg = _( "returns from constructing fortifications" );
2764 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
2765 }
2766}
2767
2768void basecamp::recruit_return( const std::string &task, int score )
2769{
2770 const std::string msg = _( "returns from searching for recruits with "
2771 "a bit more experience" );
2772 npc_ptr comp = mission_return( task, 4_days, true, msg, "recruiting", 2 );
2773 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2774 return;
2775 }
2776
2777 npc_ptr recruit;
2778 //Success of finding an NPC to recruit, based on survival/tracking
2779 int skill = comp->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2780 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 17 ) {
2781 recruit = make_shared_fast<npc>();
2782 recruit->normalize();
2783 recruit->randomize();
2784 popup( _( "%s encountered %s" ), comp->name, recruit->name );
2785 } else {
2786 popup( _( "%s didn't find anyone to recruit" ), comp->name );
2787 return;
2788 }
2789 //Chance of convincing them to come back
2790 skill = ( 100 * comp->get_skill_level( skill_speech ) + score ) / 100;
2791 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + skill > 19 ) {
2792 popup( _( "%s convinced %s to hear a recruitment offer from you" ), comp->name,
2793 recruit->name );
2794 } else {
2795 popup( _( "%s wasn't interested in anything %s had to offer" ), recruit->name,
2796 comp->name );
2797 return;
2798 }
2799 //Stat window
2800 int rec_m = 0;
2801 int appeal = rng( -5, 3 ) + std::min( skill / 3, 3 );
2802 int food_desire = rng( 0, 5 );
2803 while( rec_m >= 0 ) {
2804 std::string description = _( "NPC Overview:\n\n" );
2805 description += string_format( _( "Name: %s\n\n" ), right_justify( recruit->name, 20 ) );
2806 description += string_format( _( "Strength: %10d\n" ), recruit->str_max );
2807 description += string_format( _( "Dexterity: %10d\n" ), recruit->dex_max );
2808 description += string_format( _( "Intelligence: %10d\n" ), recruit->int_max );
2809 description += string_format( _( "Perception: %10d\n\n" ), recruit->per_max );
2810 description += _( "Top 3 Skills:\n" );
2811
2812 const auto skillslist = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by(
2813 [&]( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
2814 const int level_a = recruit->get_skill_level( a.ident() );
2815 const int level_b = recruit->get_skill_level( b.ident() );
2816 return localized_compare( std::make_pair( -level_a, a.name() ),
2817 std::make_pair( -level_b, b.name() ) );
2818 } );
2819
2820 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[0]->name(), 12 ),
2821 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[0]->ident() ) );
2822 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n", right_justify( skillslist[1]->name(), 12 ),
2823 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[1]->ident() ) );
2824 description += string_format( "%s: %4d\n\n", right_justify( skillslist[2]->name(), 12 ),
2825 recruit->get_skill_level( skillslist[2]->ident() ) );
2826
2827 description += _( "Asking for:\n" );
2828 description += string_format( _( "> Food: %10d days\n\n" ), food_desire );
2829 description += string_format( _( "Faction Food:%9d days\n\n" ),
2830 camp_food_supply( 0, true ) );
2831 description += string_format( _( "Recruit Chance: %10d%%\n\n" ),
2832 std::min( 100 * ( 10 + appeal ) / 20, 100 ) );
2833 description += _( "Select an option:" );
2834
2835 std::vector<std::string> rec_options;
2836 rec_options.push_back( _( "Increase Food" ) );
2837 rec_options.push_back( _( "Decrease Food" ) );
2838 rec_options.push_back( _( "Make Offer" ) );
2839 rec_options.push_back( _( "Not Interested" ) );
2840
2841 rec_m = uilist( description, rec_options );
2842 if( rec_m < 0 || rec_m == 3 || static_cast<size_t>( rec_m ) >= rec_options.size() ) {
2843 popup( _( "You decide you aren't interested" ) );
2844 return;
2845 }
2846
2847 if( rec_m == 0 && food_desire + 1 <= camp_food_supply( 0, true ) ) {
2848 food_desire++;
2849 appeal++;
2850 }
2851 if( rec_m == 1 ) {
2852 if( food_desire > 0 ) {
2853 food_desire--;
2854 appeal--;
2855 }
2856 }
2857 if( rec_m == 2 ) {
2858 break;
2859 }
2860 }
2861 // Roll for recruitment
2862 if( rng( 1, 20 ) + appeal >= 10 ) {
2863 popup( _( "%s has been convinced to join!" ), recruit->name );
2864 } else {
2865 popup( _( "%s wasn't interested" ), recruit->name );
2866 // nullptr;
2867 return;
2868 }
2869 // Time durations always subtract from camp food supply
2870 camp_food_supply( 1_days * food_desire );
2871 recruit->spawn_at_precise( { g->get_levx(), g->get_levy() }, g->u.pos() + point( -4, -4 ) );
2872 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( recruit );
2873 recruit->form_opinion( g->u );
2874 recruit->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
2875 recruit->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC,
2876 recruit->global_omt_location(),
2877 recruit->getID() ) );
2878 talk_function::follow( *recruit );
2879 g->load_npcs();
2880}
2881
2882void basecamp::combat_mission_return( const std::string &miss )
2883{
2884 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( miss, 3_hours );
2885 if( comp != nullptr ) {
2886 bool patrolling = miss == "_faction_camp_combat_0";
2887 comp_list patrol;
2888 npc_ptr guy = overmap_buffer.find_npc( comp->getID() );
2889 if( guy ) {
2890 patrol.push_back( guy );
2891 }
2892 for( auto pt : comp->companion_mission_points ) {
2893 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( pt );
2894 int swim = comp->get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
2895 if( is_river( omt_ref ) && swim < 2 ) {
2896 if( swim == 0 ) {
2897 popup( _( "Your companion hit a river and didn't know how to swim" ) );
2898 } else {
2899 popup( _( "Your companion hit a river and didn't know how to swim well "
2900 "enough to cross" ) );
2901 }
2902 break;
2903 }
2904 comp->death_drops = false;
2905 bool outcome = talk_function::companion_om_combat_check( patrol, pt, patrolling );
2906 comp->death_drops = true;
2907 if( outcome ) {
2908 overmap_buffer.reveal( pt, 2 );
2909 } else if( comp->is_dead() ) {
2910 popup( _( "%s didn't return from patrol" ), comp->name );
2911 comp->place_corpse( pt );
2912 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, "DEAD NPC" );
2913 overmap_buffer.remove_npc( comp->getID() );
2914 return;
2915 }
2916 }
2917 const std::string msg = _( "returns from patrol" );
2918 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "combat", 4 );
2919 }
2920}
2921
2922bool basecamp::survey_return()
2923{
2924 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( "_faction_camp_expansion", 3_hours );
2925 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2926 return false;
2927 }
2928
2929 popup( _( "Select a tile up to %d tiles away." ), 1 );
2930 const tripoint_abs_omt where( ui::omap::choose_point() );
2931 if( where == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
2932 return false;
2933 }
2934
2935 int dist = rl_dist( where.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
2936 if( dist != 1 ) {
2937 popup( _( "You must select a tile within %d range of the camp" ), 1 );
2938 return false;
2939 }
2940 if( omt_pos.z() != where.z() ) {
2941 popup( _( "Expansions must be on the same level as the camp" ) );
2942 return false;
2943 }
2944 const point dir = talk_function::om_simple_dir( omt_pos, where );
2945 if( expansions.find( dir ) != expansions.end() ) {
2946 popup( _( "You already have an expansion at that location" ) );
2947 return false;
2948 }
2949
2950 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( where );
2951 const auto &pos_expansions = recipe_group::get_recipes_by_id( "all_faction_base_expansions",
2952 omt_ref.id().c_str() );
2953 if( pos_expansions.empty() ) {
2954 popup( _( "You can't build any expansions in a %s." ), omt_ref.id().c_str() );
2955 return false;
2956 }
2957
2958 const recipe_id expansion_type = base_camps::select_camp_option( pos_expansions,
2959 _( "Select an expansion:" ) );
2960
2961 if( !run_mapgen_update_func( expansion_type.str(), where ) ) {
2962 popup( _( "%s failed to add the %s expansion, perhaps there is a vehicle in the way." ),
2963 comp->disp_name(),
2964 expansion_type->blueprint_name() );
2965 return false;
2966 }
2967 overmap_buffer.ter_set( where, oter_id( expansion_type.str() ) );
2968 add_expansion( expansion_type.str(), where, dir );
2969 const std::string msg = _( "returns from surveying for the expansion." );
2970 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "construction", 2 );
2971 return true;
2972}
2973
2974bool basecamp::farm_return( const std::string &task, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, farm_ops op )
2975{
2976 const std::string msg = _( "returns from working your fields" );
2977 npc_ptr comp = companion_choose_return( task, 15_minutes );
2978 if( comp == nullptr ) {
2979 return false;
2980 }
2981
2982 farm_action( omt_tgt, op, comp );
2983
2984 //Give any seeds the NPC didn't use back to you.
2985 for( size_t i = 0; i < comp->companion_mission_inv.size(); i++ ) {
2986 for( const auto &it : comp->companion_mission_inv.const_stack( i ) ) {
2987 if( it.charges > 0 ) {
2988 g->u.i_add( it );
2989 }
2990 }
2991 }
2992 finish_return( *comp, true, msg, "survival", 2 );
2993 return true;
2994}

2996// window manipulation
2997void talk_function::draw_camp_tabs( const catacurses::window &win,
2998 const base_camps::tab_mode cur_tab,
2999 const std::vector<std::vector<mission_entry>> &entries )
3000{
3001 werase( win );
3002 const int width = getmaxx( win );
3003 mvwhline( win, point( 0, 2 ), LINE_OXOX, width );
3004
3005 std::vector<std::string> tabs( base_camps::all_directions.size() );
3006 for( const auto &direction : base_camps::all_directions ) {
3007 tabs.at( direction.second.tab_order ) = direction.second.tab_title.translated();
3008 }
3009 const int tab_step = 3;
3010 int tab_space = 1;
3011 int tab_x = 0;
3012 for( auto &t : tabs ) {
3013 bool tab_empty = entries[tab_x + 1].empty();
3014 draw_subtab( win, tab_space, t, tab_x == cur_tab, false, tab_empty );
3015 tab_space += tab_step + utf8_width( t );
3016 tab_x++;
3017 }
3018 wnoutrefresh( win );
3019}
3020
3021std::string talk_function::name_mission_tabs(
3022 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, const std::string &role_id,
3023 const std::string &cur_title, base_camps::tab_mode cur_tab )
3024{
3025 if( role_id != base_camps::id ) {
3026 return cur_title;
3027 }
3028 cata::optional<basecamp *> temp_camp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt_pos.xy() );
3029 if( !temp_camp ) {
3030 return cur_title;
3031 }
3032 basecamp *bcp = *temp_camp;
3033 for( const auto &direction : base_camps::all_directions ) {
3034 if( cur_tab == direction.second.tab_order ) {
3035 return bcp->expansion_tab( direction.first );
3036 }
3037 }
3038 return bcp->expansion_tab( base_camps::base_dir );
3039}
3040
3041// recipes and craft support functions
3042int basecamp::recipe_batch_max( const recipe &making ) const
3043{
3044 int max_batch = 0;
3045 const int max_checks = 9;
3046 for( size_t batch_size = 1000; batch_size > 0; batch_size /= 10 ) {
3047 for( int iter = 0; iter < max_checks; iter++ ) {
3048 time_duration work_days = base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration(
3049 max_batch + batch_size ) );
3050 int food_req = time_to_food( work_days );
3051 bool can_make = making.deduped_requirements().can_make_with_inventory(
3052 _inv, making.get_component_filter(), max_batch + batch_size );
3053 if( can_make && camp_food_supply() > food_req ) {
3054 max_batch += batch_size;
3055 } else {
3056 break;
3057 }
3058 }
3059 }
3060 return max_batch;
3061}

3069 if( !result.is_null() ) {

3071 }
3072 }

3127
3128int om_harvest_furn_est( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance )
3129{
3130 return om_harvest_furn( comp, omt_tgt, f, chance, true, false );
3131}
3132int om_harvest_furn_break( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance )
3133{
3134 return om_harvest_furn( comp, omt_tgt, f, chance, false, false );
3135}
3136int om_harvest_furn( npc &comp, const tripoint &omt_tgt, const furn_id &f, int chance,
3137 bool estimate, bool bring_back )
3138{
3139 const furn_t &furn_tgt = f.obj();
3140 tinymap target_bay;
3141 target_bay.load( tripoint( omt_tgt.x * 2, omt_tgt.y * 2, omt_tgt.z ), false );
3142 int harvested = 0;
3143 int total = 0;
3144 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z );
3145 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z );
3146 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3147 if( target_bay.furn( p ) == f && x_in_y( chance, 100 ) ) {
3148 total++;
3149 if( estimate ) {
3150 continue;
3151 }
3152 if( bring_back ) {
3153 for( const item &itm : item_group::items_from( furn_tgt.bash.drop_group,
3154 calendar::turn ) ) {
3155 comp.companion_mission_inv.push_back( itm );
3156 }
3157 harvested++;
3158 }
3159 if( bring_back || comp.str_cur > furn_tgt.bash.str_min + rng( -2, 2 ) ) {
3160 target_bay.furn_set( p, furn_tgt.bash.furn_set );
3161 }
3162 }
3163 }
3164 target_bay.save();
3165 if( bring_back ) {
3166 return harvested;
3167 }
3168 return total;
3169}

3199 }
3200 harvested++;
3201 target_bay.ter_set( p, ter_tgt.bash.ter_set );
3202 }

3206 if( bring_back ) {

3211
3212int om_cutdown_trees_est( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance )
3213{
3214 return om_cutdown_trees( omt_tgt, chance, true, false );
3215}
3216int om_cutdown_trees_logs( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance )
3217{
3218 return om_cutdown_trees( omt_tgt, chance, false, true );
3219}
3220int om_cutdown_trees_trunks( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance )
3221{
3222 return om_cutdown_trees( omt_tgt, chance, false, false );
3223}
3224int om_cutdown_trees( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance, bool estimate,
3225 bool force_cut_trunk )
3226{
3227 tinymap target_bay;
3228 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3229 int harvested = 0;
3230 int total = 0;
3231 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
3232 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
3233 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3234 if( target_bay.ter( p ).obj().has_flag( flag_TREE ) && rng( 0, 100 ) < chance ) {
3235 total++;
3236 if( estimate ) {
3237 continue;
3238 }
3239 tripoint delta{
3240 3 * ( 2 * rng( 0, 1 ) - 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
3241 3 * rng( -1, 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
3242 omt_tgt.z()
3243 };
3244 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( p, p + delta, rng( 1, 8 ) );
3245 for( auto &elem : tree ) {
3246 target_bay.destroy( elem );
3247 target_bay.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
3248 }
3249 target_bay.ter_set( p, t_dirt );
3250 harvested++;
3251 }
3252 }
3253 if( estimate ) {
3254 return total;
3255 }
3256 if( !force_cut_trunk ) {
3257 target_bay.save();
3258 return harvested;
3259 }
3260 // having cut down the trees, cut the trunks into logs
3261 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3262 if( target_bay.ter( p ) == ter_id( "t_trunk" ) ) {
3263 target_bay.ter_set( p, t_dirt );
3264 target_bay.spawn_item( p, itype_log, rng( 2, 3 ), 0, calendar::turn );
3265 harvested++;
3266 }
3267 }
3268 target_bay.save();
3269 return harvested;
3270}
3271
3272mass_volume om_harvest_itm( npc_ptr comp, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, int chance,
3273 bool take )
3274{
3275 tinymap target_bay;
3276 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3277 units::mass harvested_m = 0_gram;
3278 units::volume harvested_v = 0_ml;
3279 units::mass total_m = 0_gram;
3280 units::volume total_v = 0_ml;
3281 int total_num = 0;
3282 int harvested_num = 0;
3283 tripoint mapmin = tripoint( 0, 0, omt_tgt.z() );
3284 tripoint mapmax = tripoint( 2 * SEEX - 1, 2 * SEEY - 1, omt_tgt.z() );
3285 for( const tripoint &p : target_bay.points_in_rectangle( mapmin, mapmax ) ) {
3286 for( const item &i : target_bay.i_at( p ) ) {
3287 total_m += i.weight( true );
3288 total_v += i.volume( true );
3289 total_num += 1;
3290 if( take && x_in_y( chance, 100 ) ) {
3291 if( comp ) {
3292 comp->companion_mission_inv.push_back( i );
3293 }
3294 harvested_m += i.weight( true );
3295 harvested_v += i.volume( true );
3296 harvested_num += 1;
3297 }
3298 }
3299 if( take ) {
3300 target_bay.i_clear( p );
3301 }
3302 }
3303 target_bay.save();
3304 mass_volume results;
3305 if( take ) {
3306 results.wgt = harvested_m;
3307 results.vol = harvested_v;
3308 results.count = harvested_num;
3309 } else {
3310 results.wgt = total_m;
3311 results.vol = total_v;
3312 results.count = total_num;
3313 }
3314 return results;
3315}
3316
3317tripoint_abs_omt om_target_tile( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, int min_range, int range,
3318 const std::vector<std::string> &possible_om_types, bool must_see,
3319 bool popup_notice, const tripoint_abs_omt &source, bool bounce )
3320{
3321 bool errors = false;
3322 if( popup_notice ) {
3323 popup( _( "Select a location between %d and %d tiles away." ), min_range, range );
3324 }
3325
3326 std::vector<std::string> bounce_locations = { "faction_hide_site_0" };
3327
3328 tripoint_abs_omt where;
3329 om_range_mark( omt_pos, range );
3330 om_range_mark( omt_pos, min_range, true, "Y;X: MIN RANGE" );
3331 if( source == tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
3332 where = ui::omap::choose_point();
3333 } else {
3334 where = ui::omap::choose_point( source );
3335 }
3336 om_range_mark( omt_pos, range, false );
3337 om_range_mark( omt_pos, min_range, false, "Y;X: MIN RANGE" );
3338
3339 if( where == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
3340 return tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 );
3341 }
3342 int dist = rl_dist( where.xy(), omt_pos.xy() );
3343 if( dist > range || dist < min_range ) {
3344 popup( _( "You must select a target between %d and %d range from the base. Range: %d" ),
3345 min_range, range, dist );
3346 errors = true;
3347 }
3348
3349 tripoint_abs_omt omt_tgt = where;
3350
3351 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_tgt );
3352
3353 if( must_see && !overmap_buffer.seen( omt_tgt ) ) {
3354 errors = true;
3355 popup( _( "You must be able to see the target that you select." ) );
3356 }
3357
3358 if( !errors ) {
3359 for( const std::string &pos_om : bounce_locations ) {
3360 if( bounce && omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om && range > 5 ) {
3361 if( query_yn( _( "Do you want to bounce off this location to extend range?" ) ) ) {
3362 om_line_mark( omt_pos, omt_tgt );
3363 tripoint_abs_omt dest =
3364 om_target_tile( omt_tgt, 2, range * .75, possible_om_types, true, false,
3365 omt_tgt, true );
3366 om_line_mark( omt_pos, omt_tgt, false );
3367 return dest;
3368 }
3369 }
3370 }
3371
3372 if( possible_om_types.empty() ) {
3373 return omt_tgt;
3374 }
3375
3376 for( const std::string &pos_om : possible_om_types ) {
3377 if( omt_ref.id().c_str() == pos_om ) {
3378 return omt_tgt;
3379 }
3380 }
3381 }
3382
3383 return om_target_tile( omt_pos, min_range, range, possible_om_types );
3384}
3385
3386void om_range_mark( const tripoint_abs_omt &origin, int range, bool add_notes,
3387 const std::string &message )
3388{
3389 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts;
3390 //North Limit
3391 for( int x = origin.x() - range; x < origin.x() + range + 1; x++ ) {
3392 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( x, origin.y() - range, origin.z() ) );
3393 }
3394 //South
3395 for( int x = origin.x() - range; x < origin.x() + range + 1; x++ ) {
3396 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( x, origin.y() + range, origin.z() ) );
3397 }
3398 //West
3399 for( int y = origin.y() - range; y < origin.y() + range + 1; y++ ) {
3400 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( origin.x() - range, y, origin.z() ) );
3401 }
3402 //East
3403 for( int y = origin.y() - range; y < origin.y() + range + 1; y++ ) {
3404 note_pts.push_back( tripoint_abs_omt( origin.x() + range, y, origin.z() ) );
3405 }
3406
3407 for( auto pt : note_pts ) {
3408 if( add_notes ) {
3409 if( !overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) ) {
3410 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, message );
3411 }
3412 } else {
3413 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) && overmap_buffer.note( pt ) == message ) {
3414 overmap_buffer.delete_note( pt );
3415 }
3416 }
3417 }
3418}
3419
3420void om_line_mark( const tripoint_abs_omt &origin, const tripoint_abs_omt &dest, bool add_notes,
3421 const std::string &message )
3422{
3423 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts = line_to( origin, dest );
3424
3425 for( auto pt : note_pts ) {
3426 if( add_notes ) {
3427 if( !overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) ) {
3428 overmap_buffer.add_note( pt, message );
3429 }
3430 } else {
3431 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( pt ) && overmap_buffer.note( pt ) == message ) {
3432 overmap_buffer.delete_note( pt );
3433 }
3434 }
3435 }
3436}

3439{
3440 const base_camps::miss_data &miss_info = base_camps::miss_info[ input_mission ];
3441 return miss_info.action.translated();
3442

3444
3445bool om_set_hide_site( npc &comp, const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt,
3446 const std::vector<item *> &itms,
3447 const std::vector<item *> &itms_rem )
3448{
3449 tinymap target_bay;
3450 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_tgt ), false );
3451 target_bay.ter_set( point( 11, 10 ), t_improvised_shelter );
3452 for( auto i : itms_rem ) {
3453 comp.companion_mission_inv.add_item( *i );
3454 target_bay.i_rem( point( 11, 10 ), i );
3455 }
3456 for( auto i : itms ) {
3457 target_bay.add_item_or_charges( point( 11, 10 ), *i );
3458 g->u.use_amount( i->typeId(), 1 );
3459 }
3460 target_bay.save();
3461
3462 overmap_buffer.ter_set( omt_tgt, oter_id( "faction_hide_site_0" ) );
3463
3464 overmap_buffer.reveal( omt_tgt.xy(), 3, 0 );
3465 return true;
3466}
3467
3468// path and travel time
3469time_duration companion_travel_time_calc( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos,
3470 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_tgt, time_duration work, int trips, int haulage )
3471{
3472 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> journey = line_to( omt_pos, omt_tgt );
3473 return companion_travel_time_calc( journey, work, trips, haulage );
3474}
3475
3476time_duration companion_travel_time_calc( const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> &journey,
3477 time_duration work, int trips, int haulage )
3478{
3479 int one_way = 0;
3480 for( auto &om : journey ) {
3481 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( om );
3482 std::string om_id = omt_ref.id().c_str();
3483 //Player walks 1 om is roughly 30 seconds
3484 if( om_id == "field" ) {
3485 one_way += 30 + 30 * haulage;
3486 } else if( om_id == "forest" ) {
3487 one_way += 40 + 30 * haulage;
3488 } else if( om_id == "forest_thick" ) {
3489 one_way += 50 + 30 * haulage;
3490 } else if( om_id == "forest_water" ) {
3491 one_way += 60 + 30 * haulage;
3492 } else if( is_river( omt_ref ) ) {
3493 // hauling stuff over a river is slow, because you have to portage most items
3494 one_way += 200 + 40 * haulage;
3495 } else {
3496 one_way += 40 + 30 * haulage;
3497 }
3498 }
3499 return work + one_way * trips * 1_seconds;
3500}
3501
3502int om_carry_weight_to_trips( units::mass mass, units::volume volume,
3503 units::mass carry_mass, units::volume carry_volume )
3504{
3505 int trips_m = 1 + mass / carry_mass;
3506 int trips_v = 1 + volume / carry_volume;
3507 // return the number of round trips
3508 return 2 * std::max( trips_m, trips_v );
3509}
3510
3511int om_carry_weight_to_trips( const std::vector<item *> &itms, npc_ptr comp )
3512{
3513 units::mass total_m = 0_gram;
3514 units::volume total_v = 0_ml;
3515 for( auto &i : itms ) {
3516 total_m += i->weight( true );
3517 total_v += i->volume( true );
3518 }
3519 units::mass max_m = comp ? comp->weight_capacity() - comp->weight_carried() : 30_kilogram;
3520 //Assume an additional pack will be carried in addition to normal gear
3521 units::volume sack_v = item( itype_id( "makeshift_sling" ) ).get_storage();
3522 units::volume max_v = comp ? comp->volume_capacity() - comp->volume_carried() : sack_v;
3523 max_v += sack_v;
3524 return om_carry_weight_to_trips( total_m, total_v, max_m, max_v );
3525}
3526
3527std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> om_companion_path( const tripoint_abs_omt &start, int range_start,
3528 bool bounce )
3529{
3530 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> scout_points;
3531 tripoint_abs_omt last = start;
3532 int range = range_start;
3533 int def_range = range_start;
3534 while( range > 3 ) {
3535 tripoint_abs_omt spt = om_target_tile( last, 0, range, {}, false, true, last, false );
3536 if( spt == tripoint_abs_omt( -999, -999, -999 ) ) {
3537 scout_points.clear();
3538 return scout_points;
3539 }
3540 if( last == spt ) {
3541 break;
3542 }
3543 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> note_pts = line_to( last, spt );
3544 scout_points.insert( scout_points.end(), note_pts.begin(), note_pts.end() );
3545 om_line_mark( last, spt );
3546 range -= rl_dist( spt.xy(), last.xy() );
3547 last = spt;
3548
3549 const oter_id &omt_ref = overmap_buffer.ter( last );
3550
3551 if( bounce && omt_ref.id() == "faction_hide_site_0" ) {
3552 range = def_range * .75;
3553 def_range = range;
3554 }
3555 }
3556 for( auto pt : scout_points ) {
3557 om_line_mark( pt, pt, false );
3558 }
3559 return scout_points;
3560}
3561
3562// camp utility functions
3563// mission support functions
3564std::vector<item *> basecamp::give_equipment( std::vector<item *> equipment,
3565 const std::string &msg )
3566{
3567 std::vector<item *> equipment_lost;
3568 do {
3569 std::vector<std::string> names;
3570 names.reserve( equipment.size() );
3571 for( auto &i : equipment ) {
3572 names.push_back( i->tname() + " [" + std::to_string( i->charges ) + "]" );
3573 }
3574
3575 // Choose item if applicable
3576 const int i_index = uilist( msg, names );
3577 if( i_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( i_index ) >= equipment.size() ) {
3578 return equipment_lost;
3579 }
3580 equipment_lost.push_back( equipment[i_index] );
3581 equipment.erase( equipment.begin() + i_index );
3582 } while( !equipment.empty() );
3583 return equipment_lost;
3584}
3585
3586bool basecamp::validate_sort_points()
3587{
3588 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3589 map &here = get_map();
3590 if( here.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
3591 mgr.cache_vzones();
3592 }
3593 tripoint src_loc = here.getlocal( bb_pos ) + point_north;
3594 const tripoint abspos = here.getabs( g->u.pos() );
3595 if( !mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos, 60 ) ||
3596 !mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_food, abspos, 60 ) ) {
3597 if( query_yn( _( "You do not have sufficient sort zones. Do you want to add them?" ) ) ) {
3598 return set_sort_points();
3599 } else {
3600 return false;
3601 }
3602 } else {
3603 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
3604 const std::vector<tripoint> &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
3605 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
3606 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
3607 src_loc = here.getlocal( src );
3608 break;
3609 }
3610 }
3611 set_dumping_spot( here.getabs( src_loc ) );
3612 return true;
3613}
3614
3615bool basecamp::set_sort_points()
3616{
3617 popup( _( "Sorting zones have changed. Please create some sorting zones. "
3618 "You must create a camp food zone, and a camp storage zone." ) );
3619 g->zones_manager();
3620 return validate_sort_points();
3621}

3624std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> talk_function::om_building_region(
3625 const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_pos, int range, bool purge )
3626{
3627 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, tripoint_abs_omt>> om_camp_region;
3628 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt_near_pos : points_in_radius( omt_pos, range ) ) {
3629 const oter_id &omt_rnear = overmap_buffer.ter( omt_near_pos );
3630 std::string om_rnear_id = omt_rnear.id().c_str();
3631 if( !purge || ( om_rnear_id.find( "faction_base_" ) != std::string::npos &&
3632 om_rnear_id.find( "faction_base_camp" ) == std::string::npos ) ) {
3633 om_camp_region.push_back( std::make_pair( om_rnear_id, omt_near_pos ) );
3634 }
3635 }
3636 return om_camp_region;
3637}

3646// mission descriptions
3647std::string camp_trip_description( const time_duration &total_time,
3648 const time_duration &working_time,
3649 const time_duration &travel_time, int distance, int trips,
3650 int need_food )
3651{
3652 std::string entry = "\n";
3653 //A square is roughly 3 m
3654 int dist_m = distance * SEEX * 2 * 3;
3655 if( dist_m > 1000 ) {
3656 entry += string_format( _( ">Distance:%15.2f (km)\n" ), dist_m / 1000.0 );
3657 entry += string_format( _( ">One Way: %15d (trips)\n" ), trips );
3658 entry += string_format( _( ">Covered: %15.2f (km)\n" ), dist_m / 1000.0 * trips );
3659 } else {
3660 entry += string_format( _( ">Distance:%15d (m)\n" ), dist_m );
3661 entry += string_format( _( ">One Way: %15d (trips)\n" ), trips );
3662 entry += string_format( _( ">Covered: %15d (m)\n" ), dist_m * trips );
3663 }
3664 entry += string_format( _( ">Travel: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( travel_time ), 23 ) );
3665 entry += string_format( _( ">Working: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( working_time ), 23 ) );
3666 entry += "---- ----\n";
3667 entry += string_format( _( "Total: %s\n" ), right_justify( to_string( total_time ), 23 ) );
3668 entry += string_format( _( "Food: %15d (kcal)\n\n" ), need_food );
3669 return entry;
3670}
3671
3672std::string basecamp::craft_description( const recipe_id &itm )
3673{
3674 const recipe &making = itm.obj();
3675
3676 std::vector<std::string> component_print_buffer;
3677 int pane = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH;
3678 const requirement_data &req = making.simple_requirements();
3679 auto tools = req.get_folded_tools_list( pane, c_white, _inv, 1 );
3680 auto comps = req.get_folded_components_list( pane, c_white, _inv,
3681 making.get_component_filter(), 1 );
3682
3683 component_print_buffer.insert( component_print_buffer.end(), tools.begin(), tools.end() );
3684 component_print_buffer.insert( component_print_buffer.end(), comps.begin(), comps.end() );
3685
3686 std::string comp;
3687 for( auto &elem : component_print_buffer ) {
3688 comp = comp + elem + "\n";
3689 }
3690 comp = string_format( _( "Skill used: %s\nDifficulty: %d\n%s\nTime: %s\n" ),
3691 making.skill_used.obj().name(), making.difficulty, comp,
3692 to_string( base_camps::to_workdays( making.batch_duration() ) ) );
3693 return comp;
3694}
3695
3696int basecamp::recruit_evaluation( int &sbase, int &sexpansions, int &sfaction, int &sbonus ) const
3697{
3698 auto e = expansions.find( base_camps::base_dir );
3699 if( e == expansions.end() ) {
3700 sbase = 0;
3701 sexpansions = 0;
3702 sfaction = 0;
3703 sbonus = 0;
3704 return 0;
3705 }
3706 sbase = e->second.cur_level * 5;
3707 sexpansions = expansions.size() * 2;
3708
3709 //How could we ever starve?
3710 //More than 5 farms at recruiting base
3711 int farm = 0;
3712 for( const point &dir : directions ) {
3713 if( has_provides( "farming", dir ) ) {
3714 farm++;
3715 }
3716 }
3717 sfaction = std::min( camp_food_supply() / 10000, 10 );
3718 sfaction += std::min( camp_discipline() / 10, 5 );
3719 sfaction += std::min( camp_morale() / 10, 5 );
3720
3721 //Secret or Hidden Bonus
3722 //Please avoid openly discussing so that there is some mystery to the system
3723 sbonus = 0;
3724 if( farm >= 5 ) {
3725 sbonus += 10;
3726 }
3727 //More machine than man
3728 //Bionics count > 10, respect > 75
3729 if( g->u.get_bionics().size() > 10 && camp_discipline() > 75 ) {
3730 sbonus += 10;
3731 }
3732 //Survival of the fittest
3733 if( g->get_kill_tracker().npc_kill_count() > 10 ) {
3734 sbonus += 10;
3735 }
3736 return sbase + sexpansions + sfaction + sbonus;
3737}
3738int basecamp::recruit_evaluation() const
3739{
3740 int sbase;
3741 int sexpansions;
3742 int sfaction;
3743 int sbonus;
3744 return recruit_evaluation( sbase, sexpansions, sfaction, sbonus );
3745}
3746
3747std::string basecamp::recruit_description( int npc_count )
3748{
3749 int sbase;
3750 int sexpansions;
3751 int sfaction;
3752 int sbonus;
3753 int total = recruit_evaluation( sbase, sexpansions, sfaction, sbonus );
3754 std::string desc = string_format( _( "Notes:\n"
3755 "Recruiting additional followers is very dangerous and "
3756 "expensive. The outcome is heavily dependent on the "
3757 "skill of the companion you send and the appeal of "
3758 "your base.\n\n"
3759 "Skill used: speech\n"
3760 "Difficulty: 2\n"
3761 "Base Score: +%3d%%\n"
3762 "> Expansion Bonus: +%3d%%\n"
3763 "> Faction Bonus: +%3d%%\n"
3764 "> Special Bonus: +%3d%%\n\n"
3765 "Total: Skill +%3d%%\n\n"
3766 "Risk: High\n"
3767 "Time: 4 Days\n"
3768 "Positions: %d/1\n" ), sbase, sexpansions, sfaction,
3769 sbonus, total, npc_count );
3770 return desc;
3771}
3772
3773std::string basecamp::gathering_description( const std::string &bldg )
3774{
3775 item_group_id itemlist;
3776 if( item_group::group_is_defined( item_group_id( "gathering_" + bldg ) ) ) {
3777 itemlist = item_group_id( "gathering_" + bldg );
3778 } else {
3779 itemlist = item_group_id( "forest" );
3780 }
3781 std::string output;
3782
3783 // Functions like the debug item group tester but only rolls 6 times so the player
3784 // doesn't have perfect knowledge
3785 std::map<std::string, int> itemnames;
3786 for( size_t a = 0; a < 6; a++ ) {
3787 const auto items = item_group::items_from( itemlist, calendar::turn );
3788 for( auto &it : items ) {
3789 itemnames[it.display_name()]++;
3790 }
3791 }
3792 // Invert the map to get sorting!
3793 std::multimap<int, std::string> itemnames2;
3794 for( const auto &e : itemnames ) {
3795 itemnames2.insert( std::pair<int, std::string>( e.second, e.first ) );
3796 }
3797 for( const auto &e : itemnames2 ) {
3798 output = output + "> " + e.second + "\n";
3799 }
3800 return output;
3801}
3802
3803std::string basecamp::farm_description( const tripoint_abs_omt &farm_pos, size_t &plots_count,
3804 farm_ops operation )
3805{
3806 std::pair<size_t, std::string> farm_data = farm_action( farm_pos, operation );
3807 std::string entry;
3808 plots_count = farm_data.first;
3809 switch( operation ) {
3810 case farm_ops::harvest:
3811 entry += _( "Harvestable: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n" + farm_data.second;
3812 break;
3813 case farm_ops::plant:
3814 entry += _( "Ready for Planting: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n";
3815 break;
3816 case farm_ops::plow:
3817 entry += _( "Needs Plowing: " ) + std::to_string( plots_count ) + "\n";
3818 break;
3819 default:
3820 debugmsg( "Farm operations called with no operation" );
3821 break;
3822 }
3823 return entry;
3824}
3825
3826std::string camp_car_description( vehicle *car )
3827{
3828 std::string entry = string_format( _( "Name: %s\n" ), right_justify( car->name, 25 ) );
3829 entry += _( "---- Engines ----\n" );
3830 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : car->get_any_parts( "ENGINE" ) ) {
3831 const vehicle_part &pt = vpr.part();
3832 const vpart_info &vp = pt.info();
3833 entry += string_format( _( "Engine: %s\n" ), right_justify( vp.name(), 25 ) );
3834 entry += string_format( _( ">Status: %24d%%\n" ),
3835 static_cast<int>( 100 * pt.health_percent() ) );
3836 entry += string_format( _( ">Fuel: %s\n" ), right_justify( item::nname( vp.fuel_type ), 25 ) );
3837 }
3838 std::map<itype_id, int> fuels = car->fuels_left();
3839 entry += _( "---- Fuel Storage & Battery ----\n" );
3840 for( auto &fuel : fuels ) {
3841 std::string fuel_entry = string_format( "%d/%d", car->fuel_left( fuel.first ),
3842 car->fuel_capacity( fuel.first ) );
3843 entry += string_format( ">%s:%s\n", item( fuel.first ).tname(),
3844 right_justify( fuel_entry, 33 - utf8_width( item( fuel.first ).tname() ) ) );
3845 }
3846 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : car->get_all_parts() ) {
3847 if( vpr.part().is_battery() ) {
3848 const vpart_info &vp = vpr.part().info();
3849 entry += string_format( ">%s:%*d%%\n", vp.name(), 32 - utf8_width( vp.name() ),
3850 static_cast<int>( 100.0 * vpr.part().ammo_remaining() /
3851 vpr.part().ammo_capacity() ) );
3852 }
3853 }
3854 entry += "\n";
3855 entry += _( "Estimated Chop Time: 5 Days\n" );
3856 return entry;
3857}

3859// food supply
3860int camp_food_supply( int change, bool return_days )
3861{
3862 faction *yours = g->u.get_faction();
3863 yours->food_supply += change;
3864 if( yours->food_supply < 0 ) {
3865 yours->likes_u += yours->food_supply / 1250;
3866 yours->respects_u += yours->food_supply / 625;
3867 yours->food_supply = 0;
3868 }
3869 if( return_days ) {
3870 return yours->food_supply / 2500;
3871 }
3872
3873 return yours->food_supply;
3874}
3875
3876int camp_food_supply( time_duration work )
3877{
3878 return camp_food_supply( -time_to_food( work ) );
3879}
3880
3881int time_to_food( time_duration work )
3882{
3883 return 2500 * to_hours<int>( work ) / 24;
3884}
3885
3886// mission support
3887bool basecamp::distribute_food()
3888{
3889 if( !validate_sort_points() ) {
3890 popup( _( "You do not have a camp food zone. Aborting" ) );
3891 return false;
3892 }
3893
3894 zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3895 map &here = get_map();
3896 if( here.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
3897 mgr.cache_vzones();
3898 }
3899 const tripoint abspos = get_dumping_spot();
3900 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> z_food = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_food, abspos, 60 );
3901
3902 bool has_items = false;
3903 for( const tripoint &p_food_stock_abs : z_food ) {
3904 const tripoint p_food_stock = here.getlocal( p_food_stock_abs );
3905 if( !here.i_at( p_food_stock ).empty() ) {
3906 has_items = true;
3907 break;
3908 }
3909 }
3910 if( !has_items ) {
3911 popup( _( "No items are located at the drop point" ) );
3912 return false;
3913 }
3914
3915 const double quick_rot_coeff = 0.6 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.1 : 0 );
3916 const double slow_rot_coeff = 0.8 + ( has_provides( "pantry" ) ? 0.05 : 0 );
3917
3918 int total = 0;
3919 std::vector<item> keep_me;
3920 for( const tripoint &p_food_stock_abs : z_food ) {
3921 const tripoint p_food_stock = here.getlocal( p_food_stock_abs );
3922 map_stack initial_items = here.i_at( p_food_stock );
3923 for( item &i : initial_items ) {
3924 const bool is_contained_food = i.is_container() && i.get_contained().is_food();
3925 const item &innermost_item = is_contained_food ? i.get_contained() : i;
3926
3927 const bool would_npcs_eat = innermost_item.is_food()
3928 && !innermost_item.rotten()
3929 && innermost_item.get_comestible_fun() >= -6;
3930
3931 if( !would_npcs_eat ) {
3932 keep_me.push_back( std::move( i ) );
3933 continue;
3934 }
3935
3936 constexpr time_duration full_calories_threshold = 5_days;
3937 constexpr time_duration slow_rot_threshold = 2_days;
3938 // Containers handle spoilage logic internally.
3939 // so we would get very large time duration for canned or unspoilable foods.
3940 const time_duration rots_in = time_duration::from_turns( i.spoilage_sort_order() );
3941 const double rot_multiplier = ( rots_in >= full_calories_threshold ) ?
3942 1.0 :
3943 ( ( rots_in >= slow_rot_threshold ) ? slow_rot_coeff : quick_rot_coeff );
3944 // Comestible is not null for food.
3945 assert( innermost_item.get_comestible() );
3946
3947 // TODO: Probably better use component based nutrition
3948 // like in `Character::compute_effective_nutrients`.
3949 const int kcal_per_item = innermost_item.get_comestible()->default_nutrition.kcal;
3950 const double kcal_from_current = kcal_per_item * innermost_item.count() * rot_multiplier;
3951
3952 total += static_cast<int>( std::round( kcal_from_current ) );
3953
3954 // Leave empty container.
3955 // TODO: make NPCs leave empty food containers elsewhere?
3956 if( i.is_container() ) {
3957 i.contents.clear_items();
3958 i.on_contents_changed();
3959 keep_me.push_back( std::move( i ) );
3960 }
3961 }
3962 here.i_clear( p_food_stock );
3963 for( item &i : keep_me ) {
3964 here.add_item_or_charges( p_food_stock, std::move( i ), false );
3965 }
3966 keep_me.clear();
3967 }
3968
3969 popup( _( "You distribute %d kcal worth of food to your companions." ), total );
3970 camp_food_supply( total );
3971 return true;
3972}

3988
3989void basecamp::place_results( item result )
3990{
3991 if( by_radio ) {
3992 tinymap target_bay;
3993 target_bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( omt_pos ), false );
3994 const tripoint &new_spot = target_bay.getlocal( get_dumping_spot() );
3995 target_bay.add_item_or_charges( new_spot, result, true );
3996 apply_camp_ownership( new_spot, 10 );
3997 target_bay.save();
3998 } else {
3999 map &here = get_map();
4000 auto &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
4001 if( here.check_vehicle_zones( g->get_levz() ) ) {
4002 mgr.cache_vzones();
4003 }
4004 const auto abspos = here.getabs( g->u.pos() );
4005 if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos ) ) {
4006 const auto &src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_camp_storage, abspos );
4007 const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
4008 // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
4009 for( auto &src : src_sorted ) {
4010 const auto &src_loc = here.getlocal( src );
4011 here.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, result, true );
4012 apply_camp_ownership( src_loc, 10 );
4013 break;
4014 }
4015 //or dump them at players feet
4016 } else {
4017 here.add_item_or_charges( g->u.pos(), result, true );
4018 apply_camp_ownership( g->u.pos(), 0 );
4019 }
4020 }
4021}
4022
4023void apply_camp_ownership( const tripoint &camp_pos, int radius )
4024{
4025 map &here = get_map();
4026 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_rectangle( camp_pos + point( -radius, -radius ),
4027 camp_pos + point( radius, radius ) ) ) {
4028 auto items = here.i_at( p.xy() );
4029 for( item &elem : items ) {
4030 elem.set_owner( g->u );
4031 }
4032 }
4033}

4035// combat and danger
4036// this entire system is stupid
4037bool survive_random_encounter( npc &comp, std::string &situation, int favor, int threat )
4038{
4039 popup( _( "While %s, a silent specter approaches %s" ), situation, comp.name );
4040 int skill_1 = comp.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4041 int skill_2 = comp.get_skill_level( skill_speech );
4042 if( skill_1 + favor > rng( 0, 10 ) ) {
4043 popup( _( "%s notices the antlered horror and slips away before it gets too close." ),
4044 comp.name );
4045 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "gathering", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4046 } else if( skill_2 + favor > rng( 0, 10 ) ) {
4047 popup( _( "Another survivor approaches %s asking for directions." ), comp.name );
4048 popup( _( "Fearful that he may be an agent of some hostile faction, "
4049 "%s doesn't mention the camp." ), comp.name );
4050 popup( _( "The two part on friendly terms and the survivor isn't seen again." ) );
4051 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "recruiting", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4052 } else {
4053 popup( _( "%s didn't detect the ambush until it was too late!" ), comp.name );
4054 int skill = comp.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) +
4055 0.5 * comp.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) +
4056 comp.get_skill_level( skill_bashing ) +
4057 comp.get_skill_level( skill_cutting ) +
4058 comp.get_skill_level( skill_stabbing ) +
4059 comp.get_skill_level( skill_unarmed ) + comp.get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
4060 int monsters = rng( 0, threat );
4061 if( skill * rng( 8, 12 ) > ( monsters * rng( 8, 12 ) ) ) {
4062 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4063 popup( _( "The bull moose charged %s from the tree line" ), comp.name );
4064 popup( _( "Despite being caught off guard %s was able to run away until the "
4065 "moose gave up pursuit." ), comp.name );
4066 } else {
4067 popup( _( "The jabberwock grabbed %s by the arm from behind and "
4068 "began to scream." ), comp.name );
4069 popup( _( "Terrified, %s spun around and delivered a massive kick "
4070 "to the creature's torso" ), comp.name );
4071 popup( _( "Collapsing into a pile of gore, %s walked away unscathed" ),
4072 comp.name );
4073 popup( _( "(Sounds like bullshit, you wonder what really happened.)" ) );
4074 }
4075 talk_function::companion_skill_trainer( comp, "combat", 10_minutes, 10 - favor );
4076 } else {
4077 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4078 popup( _( "%s turned to find the hideous black eyes of a giant wasp "
4079 "staring back from only a few feet away" ), comp.name );
4080 popup( _( "The screams were terrifying, there was nothing anyone could do." ) );
4081 } else {
4082 popup( _( "Pieces of %s were found strewn across a few bushes." ), comp.name );
4083 popup( _( "(You wonder if your companions are fit to work on their own)" ) );
4084 }
4085 overmap_buffer.remove_npc( comp.getID() );
4086 return false;
4087 }
4088 }
4089 return true;
4090}
